original: §YBudget Deficit§!
Your coffers are empty and you owe your subjects money. The morale of your armies will suffer, and the longer this goes on, the more corruption and criminals will plague your counties.
translation: 你的金库已被挥霍一空，还欠下臣民一屁股债。部队的士气因此受到影响。长此以往，腐败和犯罪也有可能在你的领地横行。

original: I cannot afford to pay my magistrates and my debts to the lower classes are dangerously high. The peasants of [Root.GetName] are now completely disregarding my divine right to rule!
translation: 我债台高筑，已经无力支付治安官的工资。连[Root.GetName]的农民都不再尊重我的统治了！

original: The peasants of [Root.GetName] are slowly starting to respect my rule again. I should never let my treasury go negative!
translation: [Root.GetName]的百姓们现在又慢慢开始尊重我的统治了。今后我可不能再让赤字发生！

original: Due to my lack of funds to pay my sheriffs and magistrates with, a Thieves' Guild has been established in [Root.GetName].
translation: 由于我无法给治安官们付薪水，一个窃贼公会在[Root.GetName]成立了。

original: My acute budget deficit has allowed a Smugglers' Ring to appear in [Root.GetName].
translation: 严重的财政赤字使得[Root.GetName]出现了一个走私网络。

original: My underfunded sheriffs have allowed a large band of robbers to rise in [Root.GetName]. They are too craven to attack my castles though.
translation: 没领到足够工资的治安官们默许了一支强盗团伙在[Root.GetName]兴起。不过他们还没胆子来打劫我的城堡。

original: My labor was difficult and I fear that something is wrong with me. The midwives look worried, and I feel so terribly weak...
translation: 生产过程十分困难，恐怕是我的身体出了问题。接生婆看起来十分慌张。我觉得自己很不舒服……

original: I must pray to [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]
Nana says I am not sick anymore.
translation: 保姆说我已经不再是个病秧子了。

original: I can run!
Sickly

translation: 这个孩子生来多病，也许活不过婴儿期。

Random Character

Judaism is the oldest of the Abrahamic religions and its origins can be traced back all the way to the Bronze Age. The holiest city of this monotheistic faith is Jerusalem, which served as the capital of the ancient Kingdom of Israel.
translation: 犹太教是最古老的亚伯拉罕宗教，它的起源可以追溯到青铜时代。这个一神教的圣城是古以色列王国的首都耶路撒冷。

original: Build the Third Temple

The First and Second Holy Temples in Jerusalem were both destroyed by invading armies. Now that the city has finally been restored to Jewish rule, the time has come to begin construction of a Third Temple.
translation: 耶路撒冷第一圣殿和第二圣殿都被入侵的敌军摧毁了。如今，犹太人终于又一次统治了圣城，是时候开始修建第三圣殿了。

original: Construction of the Third Temple will begin immediately on Temple Mount overlooking Jerusalem. The design of the new temple is greater in scope than even King Solomon's fabled First Temple. Your architects estimate that the construction will take roughly four years. When it is finished, it will truly be a sight to see!
translation: 第三圣殿的修建将会立刻在能够俯瞰整个耶路撒冷城的圣殿山上展开。新的圣殿将会比寓言中的所罗门第一圣殿设计得更为宏大。你手下的建筑师们预计，修建这座圣殿将使用整整四年的时间。一经完工，它必将成为耶路撒冷的新的地标！

original: Our people need but wait a little longer.
translation: 我们的人民只需要再等一会儿。

original: The Third Temple

The First Temple, built by King Solomon, was destroyed by the invading Babylonians. The Second Temple, built under the auspices of Cyrus the Great of Persia, was razed by the Romans after a terrible siege. The Third Temple, however, built by the great [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], shall stand for all eternity!\n\nFrom its position on Temple Mount, the magnificent building has become a dominant feature of Jerusalem, instantly recognizable from far away by travellers approaching the city. Truly, Solomon himself would have been moved to tears by the sight.
translation: 由所罗门王建造的第一圣殿被巴比伦的入侵者摧毁了。由波斯帝国的居鲁士大帝主持修建的第二圣殿又被罗马人夷为平地。但是，伟大的[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]兴建的第三圣殿将会永远屹立！\n\n高耸雄伟的圣殿坐落在圣殿山上，成为耶路撒冷的标志。前来圣城的旅行者们远远地就能一眼辨别出它。这景象，就是所罗门王亲临，也一定会被感动的流泪。

original: It is beautiful.
Restore the High Priesthood

The office of the Kohen Gadol - the High Priest of Judaism - has been vacant since the destruction of the Second Temple at the hands of the Romans. Now that the Third Temple has been built, perhaps a new High Priest should be appointed.
translation: 犹太教的首席大祭司这个神圣的职位随着第二圣殿一起被罗马人摧毁了。如今第三圣殿已经兴建完成，或许我们也该任命一位新的首席大祭司了。

original: Create Israel
It is time for the Children of Israel to found a new United Monarchy built around Jerusalem and the Promised Land, so that Jews may once more live together in peace and harmony.
translation: 以色列的子孙们是时候在耶路撒冷与应许之地上建立一个统一的新王国了。如此一来，犹太人又能再一次和平安宁的生活在一起。

original: Israel
Israelites
The Kingdom of Israel is reborn.
The Promised Land

With Jerusalem and the Promised Land under Jewish control, the time is ripe for the creation of a new United Monarchy named Israel - like the great kingdom of ancient times under David and Solomon.\n\nThe long-suffering Jewish people are finally in control of their own destiny again. No longer shall the Holy Land be torn asunder by warring Christian and Muslim lords. May this new kingdom usher in an era of peace and prosperity for the region!
translation: 耶路撒冷与应许之地已经在犹太人的控制之下，建立统一的犹太王国的时机已经成熟。就像古时大卫王和所罗门王的王国一样，新生的犹太王国将被命名为以色列。\n\n经历了长久的苦难，犹太人终于重新掌握住了自己的命运。不要再让基督徒和穆斯林们将圣地亵渎。愿新生的王国向世界宣告，这个古老宗教进入了一个和平富足的时代！

original: Long live Israel!

Notification Events
The Crusading Era has Begun\n
The Great Jihad Era has Begun\n
The Pagan Great Holy War Era has Begun\n
translation: 原始宗教大圣战时代到来\n

original: Crusader Kings

Christian Pilgrims to the the Holy Land suffer all manner of abuse and the routes are not safe. In order to protect the pilgrims and secure Jerusalem for Christ and the faithful, His Holiness, [Root.GetTitledName], has accepted the possibility of an outright invasion by joint Christian forces. This signals a new era of large scale Christian holy wars - the Crusades.
translation: 去圣地朝圣的基督徒常常遭受各种侮辱和迫害，朝圣之路并不安全。为了保护朝圣者，也为了替基督和信徒们夺取耶路撒冷，[Root.GetTitledName]陛下认为可以集结基督徒的力量对异教徒进行一次彻底的入侵。这预示着大规模基督教圣战的时代开始了——十字军。

original: Deus Vult!
Foolish Posturing!

The Roman Empire in the East. Byzantium - Christianity's firm bulwark against the Mohammedan infidels of the Orient - is failing. The dire situation has convinced His Holiness, [Root.GetTitledName], to accept the possibility of an outright invasion by joint Christian forces. This signals a new era of large scale Christian holy wars - the Crusades.
translation: 东方的罗马帝国，基督教对抗东方穆罕默德异教徒的坚实壁垒——拜占庭正在陷落。可怕的现状让[Root.GetTitledName]陛下开始思考集结基督徒的力量对异教徒进行彻底入侵的可能性。大规模的基督教圣战开始了——这就是十字军。

original: Rome, the city of Saint Peter and the very seat of the Papacy itself, has fallen to infidels. In response, the Pope-in-exile, His Holiness, [Root.GetTitledName], has declared his intention to forge a great alliance of Christian lords in order to reclaim the eternal city. This signals a new era of large scale Christian holy wars - the Crusades.
translation: 罗马，圣伯多禄的城市，教宗的圣座，被异教徒占领了。作为回应，流亡的教宗，[Root.GetTitledName]陛下宣布要集结基督教领主的力量夺回永恒之城。大规模的基督教圣战开始了——这就是十字军。

original: The very heartlands of Western Christianity are under siege by infidels! Desperate Christian lords have persuaded His Holiness, [Root.GetTitledName], to declare his intention of forging a great and righteous alliance to expel the heathens in the name of God. This signals a new era of large scale Christian holy wars - the Crusades.
translation: 西方基督教的腹地被异教徒攻陷了！绝望的基督教领主们说服了[Root.GetTitledName]陛下在神的名义下联合基督教领主们，用强大的力量驱逐异教徒。大规模的基督教圣战开始了——这就是十字军。

original: Renewed Jihad

His Magnificence, [Root.GetTitledName], has been convinced by his [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s that it is time to declare another era of Great Conquests, such as was the case under the first Caliphs. The Dar al-Islam must grow again. All righteous Muslim men should prepare to join the ranks of the mujahideen for the upcoming struggles. This signals a renewed era of Islamic expansion.
translation: 伟大的陛下[Root.GetTitledName]已经被[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]们说服，现在正是时候宣布穆斯林们新的征服。如同正统哈里发时期那样，伊斯兰世界必须再一次地扩张。所有正义的穆斯林男人都应该准备加入军队，应对即将到来的战争。这标志着伊斯兰扩张再次开始。

original: Allahu Akbar!
Disturbing News

The Holy City of Jerusalem, where the Prophet was taken up to heaven, has fallen to infidels! His Magnificence, [Root.GetTitledName], will not let this stand, and has declared that another era of Great Conquests is upon us, such as was the case in the days of the first Caliphs. The Dar al-Islam must be defended! All righteous Muslim men should prepare to join the ranks of the mujahideen for the upcoming struggles. This signals a renewed era of Islamic expansion.
translation: 圣城耶路撒冷，先知夜行登霄之处，已经被异教徒攻陷！伟大的陛下[Root.GetTitledName]绝不会坐视不管！他宣布穆斯林将会像正统哈里发时期一样，再一次开始伟大的征服，守护伊斯兰世界！所有正义的穆斯林男人都应该准备加入军队，应对即将到来的战争。这标志着伊斯兰扩张再次开始。

original: The unthinkable has happened! The holy city of Mecca has fallen to infidels and the Kaaba is even now being defiled by their very presence. His Magnificence, [Root.GetTitledName], has declared that an era of renewed Jihad is upon the world. The holy city must be retaken at all costs. All righteous Muslim men should prepare to join the ranks of the mujahideen for the upcoming struggles. This signals a renewed era of Islamic expansion.
translation: 难以置信！圣城麦加居然被异教徒攻陷！克尔白天房如今正收到异教徒的玷污。伟大的陛下[Root.GetTitledName]宣布全新的吉哈德将要开始，必须不惜一切代价夺回圣城。所有正义的穆斯林男人都应该准备加入军队，应对即将到来的战争。这标志着伊斯兰扩张再次开始。

original: The House of Islam is under grave threat from the onslaught of heathens and infidels in its very heartlands. In response, His Magnificence, [Root.GetTitledName], has declared that an era of renewed Jihad is upon the world. The core regions of the Dar al-Islam must be retaken at all costs. All righteous Muslim men should prepare to join the ranks of the mujahideen for the upcoming struggles. This signals a renewed era of Islamic expansion.
translation: 伊斯兰世界的心脏地带正受到来自异教徒的强烈威胁。作为回应，伟大的陛下[Root.GetTitledName]宣布全新的吉哈德将要开始。伊斯兰世界的核心地区必须被夺回，不惜一切代价。所有正义的穆斯林男人都应该准备加入军队，应对即将到来的战争。这标志着伊斯兰扩张再次开始。

original: The House of Islam is under grave threat from the onslaught of heathens and infidels in Africa. In response, His Magnificence, [Root.GetTitledName], has declared that an era of renewed Jihad is upon the world. The western regions of the Ummah must be retaken at all costs. All righteous Muslim men should prepare to join the ranks of the mujahideen for the upcoming struggles. This signals a renewed era of Islamic expansion.
translation: 伊斯兰世界正受到来自阿非利加的异教徒的强烈威胁。作为回应，伟大的陛下[Root.GetTitledName]宣布全新的吉哈德将要开始。必须不惜一切代价夺回西方的乌玛。所有正义的穆斯林男人都应该准备加入军队，应对即将到来的战争。这标志着伊斯兰扩张再次开始。

original: Wrath of the Old Gods

In response to the new era of Crusades and Jihads among the Abrahamic monotheists, the Great [Root.GetTitledName] has informed all [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s of [Root.GetPossPronoun] plans for a magnificent [Root.Religion.GetName] Pagan response. In fact, all pagan heads of religion may now declare Great Holy Wars. This could be the beginning of unprecedented Heathen aggression.
translation: 在亚伯拉罕一神教徒们互相发动十字军和吉哈德的新时代，伟大的[Root.GetTitledName]向[Root.Religion.GetName]的所有[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]通告了[Root.GetPossPronoun]计划，一个宏大的[Root.Religion.GetName]原始宗教回应。实际上，所有原始宗教的领袖都可以发起大圣战。这或许是异教徒史无前例的扩张的开始。

original: Great [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] is with us!
The Old Gods are Mighty!
Lock up your son and daughter!
[Root.Religion.GetName] rebels have risen up in [Root.GetName], led by a militant [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]. If not swiftly crushed, this revolt could spread like wildfire!
translation: 一个激进的[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]带着一伙[Root.Religion.GetName]叛军在[Root.GetName]揭竿而起。如果不快点镇压他们，这场叛乱也许会发展成燎原之火！

original: Curses!
Accursed Infidels!
[From.Religion.GetName] rebels have risen up in [From.GetName], led by a militant [From.Religion.GetPriestTitle]. If not swiftly crushed, this revolt could spread like wildfire!
translation: 一个激进的[From.Religion.GetPriestTitle]带着一伙[From.Religion.GetName]叛军在[From.GetName]揭竿而起。如果不快点镇压他们，这场叛乱也许会发展成燎原之火！

original: Another raving mob of [Root.Religion.GetName] infidels have risen up in [Root.GetName], reinforcing the ongoing uprising!
translation: 另一伙[Root.Religion.GetName]暴徒在[Root.GetName]揭竿而起。叛军们的力量又得到了加强！

original: Infidel Scum!
Another raving mob of [From.Religion.GetName] infidels have risen up in [From.GetName], reinforcing the ongoing uprising!
translation: 另一伙[From.Religion.GetName]暴徒在[From.GetName]揭竿而起。叛军们的力量又得到了加强！

original: A rebel mob breaks down my door and streams into the room. It's no use pleading for my life, I will go out fighting!
translation: 一伙叛军冲进了我家里。向他们求饶不会起作用，我要起身奋战！

original: Die you bastards! Arrgh...
They will all hang for this!
Order to Take the Vows
Order §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! to take the vows and join a monastic order.
You can order unlanded courtiers to take the vows and join a monastic order of their choice. This will disqualify them from normal inheritance, but they can still be claimants.
translation: 你可以要求没有封地的廷臣宣誓加入修会。这会使他们失去继承权，但他们仍会保留宣称。

Borrow 300¤ from the Templars
I can borrow money from the Templars and pay back the same sum at any time. However, while I'm in their debt, the Grand Master can make various requests, like one of my sons joining their ranks.
translation: 我可以向圣殿骑士团借款，这笔债务没有时限也没有利息。但是只要我没有还清欠款，大团长就有可能向我提出各种要求，比如要求我的一个儿子加入他们军团。

Borrow 300¤ from the Hashshashins
I can borrow money from the Hashshashins and pay back the same sum at any time. However, while I'm in their debt, the Grand Master can make various requests, like one of my sons joining their ranks.
translation: 我可以向阿萨辛派借款，这笔债务没有时限也没有利息。但是只要我没有还清欠款，长老就有可能向我提出各种要求，比如要求我的一个儿子加入他们军团。

original: Owes 300¤ to the Hashshashins
Borrow 300¤ from the Bektashi
I can borrow money from the Bektashi and pay back the same sum at any time. However, while I'm in their debt, the Grand Master can make various requests, like one of my sons joining their ranks.
translation: 我可以向拜克塔什教团借款，这笔债务没有时限也没有利息。但是只要我没有还清欠款，大团长就有可能向我提出各种要求，比如要求我的一个儿子加入他们军团。

original: Owes 300¤ to the Bektashi Order
Vassalize the Knights Templar
As the King of Jerusalem, it is within my power to vassalize the powerful Knights Templar at the cost of 500 gold.
translation: 身为耶路撒冷国王，我有权以500金币之价附庸强大的圣殿骑士团。

original: Vassalize the Knights Hospitaller
As the King of Jerusalem, it is within my power to vassalize the powerful Knights Hospitaller at the cost of 500 gold.
translation: 身为耶路撒冷国王，我有权以500金币之价附庸强大的医院骑士团。

original: Expelled the Knights Templar
Expel the Knights Templar
I can drive the Knights Templar from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...
translation: 我可以将圣殿骑士团赶出我的国土，没收他们的城堡。只是这么做非常不虔诚……

original: Expel the Knights Hospitaller
I can drive the Knights Hospitaller from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...
translation: 我可以将医院骑士团赶出我的国土，没收他们的城堡。只是这么做非常不虔诚……

original: Expel the Teutonic Order
I can drive the Teutonic Order from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...
translation: 我可以将条顿骑士团赶出我的国土，没收他们的城堡。只是这么做非常不虔诚……

original: Expel the Hashshashins
I can drive the dreaded Hashshashins from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a rather impious thing to do...
translation: 我可以将阿萨辛派赶出我的国土，没收他们的城堡。只是这么做非常不虔诚……

original: Expel the Bektashi Order
I can drive the Bektashi Order from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...
translation: 我可以将拜克塔什教团赶出我的国土，没收他们的城堡。只是这么做非常不虔诚……

original: Expelled the Knights Hospitaller
Expelled the Teutonic Order
Expelled the Jomsvikings
Expelled the Bektashi Order
Expelled the Hashshashins
Holy Order Expelled
Expelled from Realm
Any Province Holding
All Province Holdings

Most righteous [Root.GetTitledFirstName], I have a humble request for you in light of your debt to us. There is no rest in our defense against the infidel and we have desperate need of knights to lead our men. Thus, I would like to extend this opportunity to your able and noble son [FromFrom.GetFirstName] to serve in our ranks. Naturally, this would disinherit him. Sincerely Yours in Christ,\n\nGrand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation: 最正直的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，鉴于您欠有我们的债务，我有一个不情之请。我们长久以来一直在与异教徒作战，如今正缺少能带领军队的骑士。因此，我借此机会希望您尊贵能干的儿子[FromFrom.GetFirstName]能加入我们的军团。通常这会让他失去继承权。以基督之名，您真诚的伙伴\n\n大团长[From.GetFirstName]谨上

original: Very well, it's a good life
Pay them back instead
Never!

Most virtuous [Root.GetTitledFirstName], of course we, the Poor Fellow-Soldiers of Christ and of the Temple of Solomon, can lend you 300 gold. All that we ask in return is your future assistance in certain matters as they might arise. Pax Christi,\n\nGrand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation: 最高贵的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，我们这些基督和所罗门圣殿的贫苦战士当然可以借给您 300 金币。只希望在将来我们遇到困难的时候，您可以向我们施以援手。愿基督保佑您，\n\n大团长[From.GetFirstName]谨上

original: My liege, the Poor Fellow-Soldiers of Christ and of the Temple of Solomon stand ready to serve you in defense of Christianity and the Holy Land! Pax Christi,\n\nGrand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation: 我的领主，基督和所罗门圣殿的贫苦战士已经准备好与您一同守卫基督教和圣地！愿基督保佑您，\n\n大团长[From.GetFirstName]谨上

original: My dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the Order needs more castles in order to train troops and generate a supporting income. I am willing to cancel your debt to us if you will simply allow us to build a castle in [FromFrom.GetName]. Pax Christi,\n\nGrand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation: 亲爱的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，骑士团需要更多的城堡来训练部队并维持开销。若您能允许我们在[FromFrom.GetName]建筑一座城堡，我愿意免去您的债务。愿基督保佑您，\n\n大团长[From.GetFirstName]谨上

original: A reasonable request
The Knights Templar have constructed a castle in [Root.GetName]!
translation: 圣殿骑士团在[Root.GetName]建起了一座城堡！

original: Impressive!
My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the Knights Templar in their struggle against the infidel, even though this will forever disinherit him.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]要求加入圣殿骑士团，与异教徒作战。即使这样做会让他失去继承权。

original: Go with my blessing.
Absolutely not!
[This.GetTitledFirstName] becomes a Knight Templar.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is disappointed.

Most righteous [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the Order needs more castles in order to train troops and generate a supporting income. It has come to my attention that there is a suitable location in your demesne - in [FromFrom.GetName] to be specific. I am willing to pay you 100 gold in exchange for the right to construct a fortress there.
Pax Christi,

Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
最正直的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，骑士团需要更多的城堡来训练部队兵维持开销。我注意到，在您的直辖领地中，[FromFrom.GetName]是一个非常适合地方。我愿意出 100 金币换取您对我们在此地建筑要塞的许可。
愿基督保佑您，

大团长[From.GetFirstName]谨上

original: The Knights Templar have constructed a castle in [Root.GetName]!
translation: 圣殿骑士团在[Root.GetName]建起了一座城堡！

original:
Your majesty, this antagonism is completely unwarranted! The Order serves Christ, but, one has to wonder, do you?

With anger and sadness,

Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
陛下，您对我们的敌意毫无道理！骑士团侍奉基督，而您却对此有所怀疑是吗？

悲愤交加的，

大团长[From.GetFirstName]谨上

original: Good Riddance!
My liege, the Order of Saint John - the Knights Hospitaller - stands ready to serve you in defense of Christianity and the Holy Land! Pax Christi,\n\nGrand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation: 我的领主，圣若翰的骑士团——医院骑士团——已经准备好与您一同守卫基督教和圣地！愿基督保佑您，\n\n大团长[From.GetFirstName]

original: My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the Knights Hospitaller in their struggle against the infidel, even though this will forever disinherit him.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]要求加入医院骑士团，与异教徒作战。即使这样做会让他失去继承权。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] becomes a Knight Hospitaller.

Your Highness, this extremely generous donation will not be forgotten. You have my friendship, as well as that of the Church. Rest assured that you will be rewarded in Heaven, if not on Earth!
Pax Christi,

Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
陛下，我们不会忘记您十分慷慨的捐赠。我和教会将永远把您当做朋友。无论是在地下还是在天上，您一定会得到回报。
愿基督保佑您，

大团长[From.GetFirstName]谨上

original:
Most righteous [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the Order needs more castles in order to defend Christianity against the Infidel. It has come to my attention that there is a suitable location in your demesne - in [FromFrom.GetName] to be specific. I am willing to pay you 100 gold in exchange for the right to construct a fortress there.
Pax Christi,

Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
最正直的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，骑士团需要更多的城堡来训练部队兵维持开销。我注意到，在您的直辖领地中，[FromFrom.GetName]是一个非常适合地方。我愿意出100金币换取您对我们在此地建筑要塞的许可。
愿基督保佑您，

大团长[From.GetFirstName]谨上

original: No, that region is mine
The Knights Hospitaller have constructed a castle in [Root.GetName]!
translation: 医院骑士团在[Root.GetName]建起了一座城堡！

original: Peace be upon you, most magnificent [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. As you may know, our order is in need of leaders, and, considering your debt to us, I would like to request that your able and noble son [FromFrom.GetFirstName] serve in our ranks. Naturally, this would disinherit him. Allah be with you,\n\nGrand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation: 祝您平安，伟大的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。如您所知，我们教团缺少将领。考虑到您欠有我们的债务，我请求您能让您高贵能干的儿子[FromFrom.GetFirstName]加入我们的军团。通常这会让他失去继承权。愿安拉与您同在，\n\n大团长[From.GetFirstName]谨上

original: The Bektashi Order
They could be useful...
Mystic Soldiers? Pah!

最睿智的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，骑士团需要更多的城堡来训练部队兵维持开销。我注意到，在您的直辖领地中，[FromFrom.GetName]是一个非常适合地方。我愿意出100金币换取您对我们在此地建筑要塞的许可。
祝您平安，

大团长[From.GetFirstName]谨上

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] joins the Teutonic Order.

It has come to my attention that there is a suitable location in your demesne - in [FromFrom.GetName] to be specific. I am willing to pay you 100 gold in exchange for the right to construct a fortress there.

translation:
最正直的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，骑士团需要更多的城堡来守卫基督教，与邪恶的异教徒作战。我注意到，在您的直辖领地中，[FromFrom.GetName]是一个非常适合地方。我愿意出 100 金币换取您对我们在此地建筑要塞的许可。
愿基督保佑您，

大团长[From.GetFirstName]谨上

original: Very well

Most righteous [Root.GetTitledFirstName], of course we, the Nizari Ismailis, can lend you 300 gold. All that we ask in return is your future assistance in certain matters as they might arise. Salaam alaykum,\n\nGrand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation: 最正直的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，我们这些尼扎里伊斯玛仪派教徒当然可以借给你 300 金币。只希望在将来我们遇到困难的时候，您可以向我们施以援手。\n\n大团长[From.GetFirstName]谨上

original: The Nizari Ismaili Hashshashins have constructed a castle in [Root.GetName]!
translation: 尼扎里伊斯玛仪派的阿萨辛派在[Root.GetName]建起了一座城堡！

original: My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the dreaded Hashshashins in their shady struggles. This will forever disinherit him and he will never disgrace the dynasty with his decadence.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]要求加入阿萨辛派，与异教徒作战。这会让他失去继承权，而家族也不会再受到来自他的腐化的影响。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] joins the Hashshashins.
The Hashshashins have constructed a castle in [Root.GetName]!
translation: 阿萨辛派教徒们在[Root.GetName]建起了一座城堡！

original:
Great [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle], your antagonism is misguided! The Order serves Allah, but, one has to wonder, do you?

With furious anger,

Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
伟大的[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]，您对我们的敌意是武断的！教团侍奉安拉，而您却对此有所怀疑是吗？

怒火中烧的，

大团长[From.GetFirstName]谨上

original: My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the fearsome Jomsvikings in their adventures, even though this will forever disinherit him.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]要求加入令人闻风丧胆的约姆斯维京人，和他们一同冒险。即使这样做会让他失去继承权。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] becomes a Jomsviking.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]成为了约姆斯维京人的一员。

original:
Great [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle], your extremely generous donation will aid us greatly in our fight for the glory of the Old Gods! You have my friendship, as well as that of both gods and priesthood. May the gods smile on you.
For the Allfather!

Warchief [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
伟大的[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]，您慷慨的捐赠极大的帮助了我们为逝往神灵的荣耀而战的事业！您是我永远的朋友，神明们和祭司们也会与您为友。愿神明垂青您。
为了众神之父！

首领 [From.GetFirstName]谨上

original:
Mighty [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the Jomsviking brotherhood has need of another base from which to strike at the weak followers of the lesser gods. I understand that there is a suitable location in your demesne, in [FromFrom.GetName]. I am willing to pay you 100 gold in exchange for the right to construct a fortress there.
Glory to Odin!

Warchief [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
强大的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，约姆斯维京人的弟兄们需要一座新的基地，来打击那些次神的信徒。我了解到在您的直辖领地中，[FromFrom.GetName]是一个非常适合地方。我愿意出100金币换取您对我们在此地建筑要塞的许可。
荣耀归于奥丁！

首领 [From.GetFirstName]谨上

original: No, that region is mine
The Jomsvikings have constructed a castle in [Root.GetName]!
translation: 约姆斯维京人在[Root.GetName]建起了一座城堡！

original:
Great [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle], your wrath is misdirected! The Order serves the gods faithfully, but, one has to wonder, do you?

[From.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] curse you!,

Warchief [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
伟大的[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]，您的愤怒发泄错了对象！战团忠实地侍奉者神明，而您却对此有所怀疑是吗？

[From.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]诅咒你！

首领[From.GetFirstName]谨上

original: This will stir up the peasants...
I am greatly impressed by the wisdom of a local [Root.Location.Religion.GetName] preacher. Heresy or not, I am starting to believe...
translation: 本地一个[Root.Location.Religion.GetName]传道者用他的智慧打动了我。无论这是不是异端，我有点开始相信他说的……

original: Embrace the [Root.Location.Religion.GetName] creed!
It is too dangerous...
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetBestName] has embraced a dangerous heresy, no doubt influenced by local preachers.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetBestName]信奉起了一个危险的异端，肯定是受在当地的传道者影响了。

original: Demand reconversion!
Let it slide
Engage [From.GetObjectPronoun] in theological debate
[This.GetTitledFirstName] receives an ultimatum
A carefully written letter is sent to [This.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 一封措辞谨慎的信送到了[This.GetTitledFirstName]手里

original: It has come to my attention that your mind has been clouded by heretic nonsense. This is an affront to [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName]! Return to the true path or face my wrath. Your liege,\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 我注意到你被异端的那些歪理邪说缩蒙蔽。这是对[From.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的冒犯！重回正道吧，不然你将面对我的怒火。你的领主，\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] receives my answer
[This.GetTitledFirstName] is told of my refusal

My dear [GetFromReverseRelation], I assure you that I am a righteous believer. I shall close my ears to the spoutings of the local heretics and pray for their imminent eradication!

Your faithful [GetFromRelation],

[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
我敬爱的[GetFromReverseRelation]，我向您保证我是一个正直的信徒。我不会再听信这些异端的说辞，并祈祷他们快些被消灭。

您忠诚的[GetFromRelation]，

[From.GetTitledFirstName]谨上

original:
My dear [GetFromReverseRelation], I have mulled it over carefully but I must follow my heart and mind. The [From.Religion.GetName] faith rings true in a way that the [Root.Religion.GetName] creed does not. I will pray for your salvation.

Your faithful [GetFromRelation],

[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
我敬爱的[GetFromReverseRelation]，我对此事考虑再三，但仍旧觉得应当遵从自己的真心。[From.Religion.GetName]的信仰十分正确，[Root.Religion.GetName]的教条却并非如此。我将为您的救赎祈祷。

您忠诚的[GetFromRelation]，

[From.GetTitledFirstName]谨上

original: There will be consequences!

My dear [Root.GetFirstName], do not be swayed by the misguided arguments of [Root.Religion.GetName] preachers! Do not feel too bad though - you are not the first to fall prey to their flawed reasoning. Please study my enclosed summary of previous theological debates on the matter and I am sure you will come to your senses. Your friend and liege,\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 我亲爱的[Root.GetFirstName]，不要被[Root.Religion.GetName]传道者的妖言动摇！你也无需为此难过。你并不是第一个被他们的诡辩欺骗的人。请认真学习我随信寄来的，针对此事的神学辩论材料，我相信你一定能够清醒过来。你的朋友与领主，\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]谨上

original:
My dear [GetFromReverseRelation], your penetrating gaze can part even the thickest theological fog. I am utterly convinced by your learned arguments! Rest assured that I will never stray again.

Your grateful [GetFromRelation],

[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
我敬爱的[GetFromReverseRelation]，您敏锐的目光可以洞穿最朦胧的神学迷雾。我已被您富有学识的观点彻底说服！请您放心，我不会再步入歧途。万分感谢！

您的[GetFromRelation]，

[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] has carefully approached me about [From.GetPossPronoun] [From.Religion.GetName] beliefs, trying to convert me to [From.GetPossPronoun] way of worship!
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetTitledFirstName]小心地向我说明了[From.GetPossPronoun][From.Religion.GetName]信仰，并试图让我也信奉起[From.GetPossPronoun]信条！

original: By [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], [From.GetSubjectPronoun] is right!
No, but I won't take action
translation: 不行，但我也不会做什么

original: Engage [From.GetObjectPronoun] in theological debate
Guards! Seize the heretic!
Inform [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]...

My dear [GetFromReverseRelation], I was just approached by [FromFrom.GetBestName], who tried to convince me to join [FromFrom.GetObjectPronoun] in [FromFrom.GetPossPronoun] vile heresy! I hope you can convince [FromFrom.GetObjectPronoun] to see sense.

Your faithful [GetFromRelation],

[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:

original: The foul [From.Religion.GetName] heresy is spreading like wildfire in [From.GetName]. As the head of the true [Root.Religion.GetName] faith, I must take action to quell it in the name of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
translation: 邪恶的[From.Religion.GetName]异端正如野火般在[From.GetName]蔓延。作为正统的[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰的领袖，以[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]之名，我必须为镇压它做点什么！

original: Send in the Inquisition!
Send a legate to [From.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledName]
Open a dialogue with the heretics

translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]派来了一大批教士和卫兵来镇压[Root.GetName]的异端！

original: A messy affair...
So, now it's my problem
translation: 好吧，现在得我来处理问题了。

original: The Inquisition in [From.GetName] has failed - the heretic sentiments were just too entrenched.
translation: 宗教裁判官们在[From.GetName]失败了，异端观点已经深入人心。

original: Curse the apostates!
Well, that is a surprise!
The Inquisition in [From.GetName] has succeeded - the local heretics have been effectively suppressed.
translation: 宗教裁判官们成功地在[From.GetName]抑制了当地异端的蔓延。

original: Praise [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!

A special legate from [From.GetTitledName] has arrived at my court. The [From.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] is greatly concerned about the heretics in [FromFrom.GetName] and urges me to handle the situation.
translation: 一名[From.GetTitledName]特使来到了我的宫廷。[From.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]对[FromFrom.GetName]的异端十分关心，催促我快点解决这个情况。

original: It shall be done within 10 years!
The heretics in [From.GetName] have been eradicated as my legate instructed [From.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledName].
translation: 如我派使节吩咐[From.Holder.TopLiege.GetTitledName]应该做的那样，[From.GetName]的异端已经被消灭了。

translation: [From.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]陛下送给我 100¤ 以表扬我清除[FromFrom.GetName]的异端做出的工作。

translation: [From.GetPossPronounCap][From.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]因为我对清除[FromFrom.GetName]的异端做出的工作，撤销了我的绝罚。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has dispatched a group of prominent theologians to initiate peaceful dialogue with the heretics in [Root.GetName]!

translation: 派往[From.GetName]的神学家们失败了。异端们很有学问，早就做好了准备。

translation: 派往[From.GetName]的神学家们说服了异端们回到正道，胜利凯旋。

original: It shall go to the Crown.

Jews have been banned from your realm for some time, but strangely this seems to have had no effect on many of the malaises they were thought responsible for, such as famines and disease. By now most Jews seem to have forgiven your offenses, and you have decided to welcome them back with open arms.
translation: 犹太人被驱逐出你的国土已经有一阵子了。但是看起来饥荒、疫病这些被看做是犹太人带来的坏事却没有减少。如今许多犹太人已经原谅了你对他们的冒犯，你也决定张开双臂迎接他们回到你的国土。

original: Mistakes were made. Let us not dwell on them.
translation: 错已铸成。让我们不要再谈它们了。

You send out invitations to your Jewish vassals for the traditional Passover Seder dinner.
translation: 你邀请犹太教封臣们参加传统的逾越节晚宴。

original: You accept the invitation.
You decline the invitation.

More than 2,000 years ago, God aided the Children of Israel in their escape from slavery by inflicting ten plagues upon ancient Egypt. The last of these saw a spirit of the Lord slay every first-born in Egypt, but 'pass over' Jewish homes marked with the blood of a slaughtered lamb. This festival celebrates the return of freedom to the enslaved Jewish people.
translation: 在2000多年前，上帝降下十灾击打埃及，帮助以色列的子民逃离奴役。最后一场瘟疫中，人们看见主派下的灵杀尽了埃及地所有的长子，却「路过」了那些在门上涂了羊羔的血的犹太人家。这是一个纪念犹太人逃脱奴役，重获自由的节日。

original: Send the invitations.
Invitation to the Passover Seder dinner is sent.
translation: 逾越节晚宴的邀请已经送出。

original: You have been invited to join your liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], at the Passover Seder [From.GetSheHe] is hosting this year. This ritual dinner is held on the first night of Passover and involves the retelling of the Exodus from Egypt.
translation: 你被邀请参加由你的领主[From.GetTitledFirstName][From.GetSheHe]召开的逾越节晚宴。这项宗教晚宴在逾越节的头天晚上召开，在晚宴上会重述出埃及的故事。

original: How kind!
Unfortunately, I have other plans.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has refused your invitation to the Passover Seder, claiming [From.GetSheHe] has other plans.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝了你逾越节晚宴的邀请，声称[From.GetSheHe]有其他计划。

original: I see.

The seder dinner has begun, as is traditional on the first night of the Passover. Matzo flatbread is consumed in liberal amounts together with bitter maror herbs. Everyone is required to drink four cups of wine, each at a specific point during the seder, as the story of the Exodus from Egypt is retold and discussed.
translation: 在逾越节的头天晚上，晚宴如期进行了。人们享用了许多无酵饼和苦菜。在晚宴的四个特殊节点上，每个人都必须各喝一杯酒。会上人们还重述和讨论了出埃及的故事。

original: Pass the matzo, please.
The seder lasts well into the night, but all good things must end. Your vassals return home to celebrate the rest of Passover, but most seem to agree that your seder dinner was well worth the trip.
translation: 晚宴一直持续到深夜，但是天下无不散的宴席。你的封臣们返回家中继续庆祝逾越节，不过大家都觉得来参加你的晚宴真是不虚此行。

original: Next year in Jerusalem!

The seder lasts well into the night, but all good things must end. You return home to celebrate the rest of Passover, but you and most of the other guests seem to agree that the seder dinner was well worth the trip.
translation: 晚宴一直持续到深夜，但是天下无不散的宴席。你返回家中继续庆祝逾越节，不过你和其他宾客都觉得来参加这场晚宴真是不虚此行。

Passover is celebrated every year to commemorate the liberation of the Israelite people from slavery in Egypt. Spend lavishly and invite your vassals to make this year's celebration one to be remembered!

Brotherhood of the Holy Sepulchre

The Brotherhood has worked tirelessly to protect Christian holy sites and relics in the Holy Land ever since it was first founded in 313, when the Edict of Milan legalized Christendom throughout the Roman Empire. Until recently, the Brotherhood consisted of ordained clergy who maintained and safeguarded these religious sites through largely peaceful means.\n\nAs the winds of change sweep across the world, this holy order has now become increasingly militarized and their ranks have grown dramatically to include professional soldiers as well. They have reaffirmed their dedication to protect the Holy Land from heathen invaders, but this pledge has now extended to include the defense of all of Orthodox Christendom.
translation: 313年，米兰敕令发布，承认了基督教的合法地位，圣墓兄弟会也在当年成立。自那以后，兄弟会一直不知疲倦地辛劳工作，保护圣墓中的基督教圣地和圣物。直到前不久，兄弟会还是由神职人员通过和平的手段来保护这些宗教圣地的。\n\n但是到了最近，一切都变得不同了。兄弟会的组织正越发军事化，人数疯狂地增长，并招收了许多职业的军人。他们重申了他们会为保护圣地而奉献一切，但这条誓言如今不仅只包括圣墓，还包括了保护整个东正教信仰。

original: A laudable goal!
These clerics should stay in their monestaries.
translation: 这些僧人就该乖乖呆在修道院里。

original: My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the Brotherhood of the Holy Sepulchre in their struggle against the infidel, even though this will forever disinherit him.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]要求加入圣墓兄弟会，与异教徒作战。即使这样做会让他失去继承权。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] becomes a member of the Brotherhood.

Most righteous [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the Brotherhood needs more castles in order to train troops and generate a supporting income. It has come to my attention that there is a suitable location in your demesne - in [FromFrom.GetName] to be specific. Pax Christi,

Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]

最正直的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，兄弟会需要更多的城堡来训练部队兵维持开销。我注意到，在您的直辖领地中，[FromFrom.GetName]是一个非常适合地方。我愿意出 100 金币换取您对我们在此地建筑要塞的许可。
愿基督保佑您，

大团长[From.GetFirstName]谨上

悲愤交加的，

The Zealots

The Third Temple now stands tall on Temple Mount in Jerusalem, and several pious Jews have formed a new holy order modelled after the ancient Zealots to protect Judaism against its enemies. Just like the Jewish sect that is their namesake, these new Zealots will not shy away from violence against those they feel are deserving.\n\nSome within the Jewish religious community have accused the Zealots of taking their faith to extreme levels, but the ranks of this new order continue to swell as Jewish exiles returning to the Promised Land flock to their banner. Their numbers now include everyone from uneducated peasants to veteran soldiers from distant European wars.
translation: 第三圣殿如今屹立在耶路撒冷的圣殿山上，一些虔诚的犹太教徒效仿古老的奋锐党组建了一个新的骑士团。就如与他们同名的犹太教派一样，新的奋锐党不会羞于对他们的敌人使用暴力。\n\n犹太教团里有些人指责奋锐党的信念太过极端，但是不断有犹太教的流浪者们返回应许之地加入奋锐党，军团的人数不断增长。军团的成员现在包括从未受过教育的农民到在欧洲打过仗的老兵。

original: Any defense of Judaism is welcome.
translation: 欢迎任何守护犹太教的人。

original: Radicals and extremists, the whole lot!
translation: 一大堆激进分子和极端主义者！

The Lords of the Sky

The mighty Sky-Father of the Tengri faith is all-seeing, but still has need of human instruments on the ground. The Lords of the Sky, a new holy order that has been founded in the wake of the Tengri Reformation, ride to do battle against infidels and to spread the will of the Sky-Father to all corners of the world. The deafening sound of these knights approaching on their mounts is like thunder in the sky, and the noise alone is rumored to have made some convert to the Tengri religion on the spot.
translation: 全能的天父腾格里无所不知，但是在地上仍旧需要有人来支持。在长生天改革之后，一队名为天之骄子的骑士团已经准备好与异教徒作战，将天父的意志传到世界的每个角落。骑士们到来时震耳欲聋的马蹄声如霹雳般撕裂天际，传说有些人仅仅听到他们的声响就已经当场皈依长生天了。

original: Let them ride forward in the name of the Sky-Father!
translation: 让他们以天父的名义勇往直前！

original: What will these barbarians think of next?
translation: 这些野蛮人接下来还会想出点啥来？

original: My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the Lords of the Sky in their tireless pursuit of heathenry, even though this will forever disinherit him.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]要求加入天之骄子，永不疲倦地驱逐异教徒。即使这样做会让他失去继承权。

original:
Great [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle], your extremely generous donation will aid us greatly as we ride into battle against the enemies of the Sky-Father! Upon my honor, I shall name one of my finest steeds after you!

For the Sky-Father!
Warchief [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
伟大的[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]，您慷慨的捐赠极大地帮助了我们和老天爷的敌人作战！我将非常荣幸地把我最好的坐骑以您的名字命名！
为了老天爷！

首领[From.GetFirstName]谨上

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] becomes a Sky Lord.

Most righteous [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the Lords of the Sky are in need of more castles in order to train troops and generate a supporting income. There is a suitable location in your demesne - in [FromFrom.GetName] to be specific. I am willing to pay you 100 gold in exchange for the right to construct a fortress there.

For the Sky-Father!
Warchief [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
最正直的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，天之骄子需要更多的城堡来训练部队兵并维持开销。我注意到，在您的直辖领地中，[FromFrom.GetName]是一个非常适合地方。我愿意出 100 金币换取您对我们在此地建筑要塞的许可。
为了老天爷！

首领[From.GetFirstName]谨上

original: The Lords of the Sky have constructed a castle in [Root.GetName]!
translation: 天之骄子在[Root.GetName]建起了一座城堡！

original:
Your majesty, this antagonism is completely unwarranted! The Lords of the Sky seek only to ride into battle against the enemies of the Sky-Father. Can you make that same claim?

With anger and sadness,

Warchief [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
陛下，您对我们的敌意毫无道理！天之骄子只会和老天爷的敌人作战，您能做出这样的声明吗？

悲愤交加的，

首领[From.GetFirstName]谨上

original: Expel the Lords of the Sky
I can drive the Lords of the Sky from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...
translation: 我可以将天之骄子赶出我的国土，没收他们的城堡。只是这么做非常不虔诚……

original: Donate 300¤ to the Lords of the Sky
I can donate money to the Lords of the Sky in exchange for [Player.Religion.GetPietyName] and lifelong respect from the Tengri Priesthood.
translation: 我可以捐款给天之骄子以换取[Player.Religion.GetPietyName]，这会让我一生受到长生天祭司的尊敬。

original: Expelled the Lords of the Sky
The Spirit Guardians

With the reformation of the many African pagan belief systems into a single coherent whole, several tribes have agreed to pool together their best warriors into a single holy order. They claim to be the Guardians of the Spirits and they have vowed to defend the spirits and those who believe in them from all who would do them harm.
translation: 随着非洲信仰的改革，过去众多的非洲原始宗教被系统的整合为了一个整体。部落们同意派出他们最精锐的战士组成一个骑士团。这个骑士团自称「灵魂守卫」，宣誓会守护灵魂以及任何灵魂的信仰者免于伤害。

original: The Spirits be praised!
My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the Spirit Guardians in their brave defense of our faith, even though this will forever disinherit him.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]要求加入灵魂卫队，为守护信仰而战。即使这样做会让他失去继承权。

original:
Great [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle], your extremely generous donation shall aid us greatly in our unceasing efforts to defend the Spirits and their faithful believers! You have my friendship, as well as that of the priesthood.

May the Spirits walk with you,
Warchief [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
伟大的[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]，您慷慨的捐赠极大地帮助了守卫灵魂和信徒的事业！我和祭司们都会视您为朋友！

愿灵与您同行！
首领 [From.GetFirstName]谨上

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] becomes a Spirit Guardian.

Most righteous [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the Spirit Guardians are in need of more castles in order to train troops and generate a supporting income. There is a suitable location in your demesne - in [FromFrom.GetName] to be specific. I am willing to pay you 100 gold in exchange for the right to construct a fortress there.

May the Spirits walk with you,
Warchief [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
最正直的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，灵魂卫士需要更多的城堡来训练部队兵并维持开销。我注意到，在您的直辖领地中，[FromFrom.GetName]是一个非常适合地方。我愿意出 100 金币换取您对我们在此地建筑要塞的许可。

愿灵与您同行！
首领[From.GetFirstName]谨上

original: The Spirit Guardians have constructed a castle in [Root.GetName]!
translation: 灵魂卫队在[Root.GetName]建起了一座城堡！

original:
Your majesty, this antagonism is completely unwarranted! The Spirit Guardians walk with the Spirits and are prepared to give their lives to defend them, but, one has to wonder, are you?

With anger and sadness,

Warchief [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
陛下，您对我们的敌意毫无道理！灵魂卫队与灵同行，为了守护灵魂不惜牺牲性命，而您却对此有所怀疑是吗？

悲愤交加的，

首领[From.GetFirstName]谨上

original: Expel the Spirit Guardians
I can drive the Spirit Guardians from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...
translation: 我可以将灵魂卫队赶出我的国土，没收他们的城堡。只是这么做非常不虔诚……

original: Donate 300¤ to the Spirit Guardians
I can donate money to the Spirit Guardians in exchange for [Player.Religion.GetPietyName] and lifelong respect from the Priesthood.
translation: 我可以捐款给灵魂卫士以换取[Player.Religion.GetPietyName]，这会让我一生受到祭司的尊敬。

original: Expelled the Spirit Guardians
The Warriors of Perun

The Slavic faith has been reformed and this has led to a religious fervor throughout the lands of the Slavs the likes of which has never been seen before. Many of the greatest champions have come together to form a new Slavic holy order. They call themselves the Warriors of Perun, the god of thunder, and have all taken vows to defend the Slavic faith and its believers to their dying breaths.
translation: 斯拉夫信仰的改革在斯拉夫人的土地上掀起了从未有过的宗教狂热。许许多多伟大的战士聚到一起，组成了一个骑士团。他们自称为雷电之神「佩伦的勇士」，誓死守卫斯拉夫信仰。

original: May the enemies of Perun quake in their boots!
translation: 让佩伦的敌人们在恐惧中颤抖吧！

original: My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the Warriors of Perun in their heroic deeds to smite the enemies of the gods, even though this will forever disinherit him.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]要求加入佩伦的勇士，和他们一起击溃众神的敌人。即使这样做会让他失去继承权。

original:
Great [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle], your extremely generous donation shall aid us greatly in our quest to serve the will of Perun! You have my friendship, as well as that of the priesthood.

May Perun watch over you,
Warchief [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
伟大的[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]，您慷慨的捐赠极大地帮助了我们贯彻佩伦的意志！我和祭司们都会视您为朋友！

愿佩伦守护您，
首领[From.GetFirstName]谨上

There is a suitable location in your demesne - in [FromFrom.GetName] to be specific. I am willing to pay you 100 gold in exchange for the right to construct a fortress there.

愿佩伦守护您！

Your majesty, this antagonism is completely unwarranted! The Warriors of Perun serve at the pleasure of the gods, but, one has to wonder, do you?

With anger and sadness,

translation:
陛下，您对我们的敌意毫无道理！佩伦的勇士侍奉神明，而您却对此有所怀疑是吗？

悲愤交加的，

首领[From.GetFirstName]谨上

original: Expel the Warriors of Perun
I can drive the Warriors of Perun from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...
translation: 我可以将佩伦的勇士赶出我的国土，没收他们的城堡。只是这么做非常不虔诚……

original: Donate 300¤ to the Warriors of Perun
translation: 捐赠 300¤ 给驱逐佩伦的勇士

original: I can donate money to the Warriors of Perun in exchange for [Player.Religion.GetPietyName] and lifelong respect from the Priesthood.
translation: 我可以捐款给佩伦的勇士以换取[Player.Religion.GetPietyName]，这会让我一生受到祭司的尊敬。

original: Expelled the Warriors of Perun
translation: 曾驱逐驱逐佩伦的勇士

original: The Chosen of Perkunas

Perkunas, the god of thunder, has spoken! As the Romuvan religion reforms to better face the modern world, several champions have stepped forward, claiming that Perkunas has willed them to found a new holy order. The Chosen of Perkunas, as they call themselves, have sworn to defend the Romuvan faith and to direct the wrath of the gods towards the skulls of their enemies.
translation: 闪电之神佩尔库纳斯降下神谕！洛姆瓦宗教为了应对新的环境而进行了改革，许多战士也挺身而出，为重获新生的宗教组建一支新的圣战军团。他们称自己为佩尔库纳斯精兵，宣誓守卫洛姆瓦信仰，用神明的愤怒击碎他们的敌人。

original: Like a thunderbolt, they shall strike down their foes!
translation: 他们会像闪电一样击倒他们的敌人！

original: My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the Chosen of Perkunas in their war against unbelievers, even though this will forever disinherit him.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]要求加入佩尔库纳斯精兵，和不信者们作战。即使这样做会让他失去继承权。

Great [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle], your extremely generous donation shall aid us greatly in our quest to serve the will of Perkunas! You have my friendship, as well as that of the priesthood.

伟大的[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]，您慷慨的捐赠极大地帮助了我们贯彻佩尔库纳斯的意志！我和祭司们都会视您为朋友！

translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]成为了一名佩尔库纳斯精兵。

translation: 曾驱逐佩尔库纳斯精兵

original: The Sons of Kaleva

A new Finnish holy order has surfaced dedicated to the preservation and defense of the new reformed Suomenusko religion. These warriors call themselves the 'Sons of Kaleva' and they are prepared to march into battle against all those who would deny the truth of their faith. Many Finns look upon them as the heroes of their ancient myths, and they seem to have no shortage of recruits.
translation: 一个新的芬兰骑士团投身于守卫改革后的索米信仰。这些战士称呼自己为「卡勒瓦之子」，准备着与任何不信他们信仰的人开战。许多芬兰人将他们视为古老神话中的英雄，看来这些战士们不会缺少新鲜的血液。

original: They are like the heroes of myth!
translation: 他们就像神话中的英雄！

original: My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the heroes in the Sons of Kaleva in struggle against heathens, even though this will forever disinherit him.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]要求加入英雄般的卡勒瓦之子，与异教徒作战。即使这样做会让他失去继承权。

original: Expelled the Sons of Kaleva
The Cult of Huitzilopochtli

The Easterners across the sea have more religions than a parrot has feathers, but the Aztec faith has now been reformed and reorganized to better stand against the heathens. Several warrior-priests have also founded a new holy order: the Cult of Huitzilopochtli. Devoted to the Aztec deity of war, this cult is bent on the forceful conversion of the world – preferably with lots of human sacrifice in the process.
translation: 大海对岸这些东方人的信仰比鹦鹉的羽毛还多，但如今阿兹克特信仰经过改革和重组，已经能更好的对抗这些异教徒。一些战牧还建起了一支新的圣战军团：维齐洛波奇特利教派。这个教派向阿兹特克的战争之神献身，狂热于向世界武力传教——最妙的是他们在传道的过程里还会献祭许多的活人。

original: May their sacrifices be many and gruesome.
translation: 愿他们的献祭能令人畏惧。

original: My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the Cult of Huitzilopochtli in their ongoing efforts to rip the heart out of every heathen unbeliever, even though this will forever disinherit him.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]要求加入维齐洛波奇特利教派，和他们一起挖出每个不信者的心脏。即使这样做会让他失去继承权。

Great [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle], your extremely generous donation shall aid us greatly in organizing the sacrifice rituals that Huitzilopochtli demand! You have my friendship, as well as that of the priesthood.

Huitzilopochtli's faithful servant,
