translation: 捐赠 300¤ 给维齐洛波奇特利教派

original: I can donate money to the Cult of Huitzilopochtli in exchange for [Player.Religion.GetPietyName] and lifelong respect from the Priesthood.
translation: 我可以捐款给维齐洛波奇特利教派以换取[Player.Religion.GetPietyName]，这会让我一生受到祭司的尊敬。

original: Expelled the Cult of Huitzilopochtli
translation: 曾驱逐维齐洛波奇特利教派

original: The Knights of Santiago
Brave warriors of Christ!
Worrying...
My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the Knights of Santiago in their struggle against the infidel, even though this will forever disinherit him.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]要求加入圣地亚哥骑士团，与异教徒作战。即使这样做会让他失去继承权。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] becomes a Knight of Santiago.

Most righteous [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the Knights of Santiago need more castles in order to train troops and generate a supporting income. There is a suitable location in your demesne - in [FromFrom.GetName] to be specific. I am willing to pay you 100 gold in exchange for the right to construct a fortress there.

Pax Christi,
Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
最正直的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，圣地亚哥骑士团需要更多的城堡来训练部队兵维持开销。我注意到，在您的直辖领地中，[FromFrom.GetName]是一个非常适合地方。我愿意出 100 金币换取您对我们在此地建筑要塞的许可。
愿基督保佑您，

大团长[From.GetFirstName]谨上

original: The Knights of Santiago have constructed a castle in [Root.GetName]!
translation: 圣地亚哥骑士团在[Root.GetName]建起了一座城堡！

original:
Your majesty, this antagonism is completely unwarranted! The Knights of Santiago serve Christ, but, one has to wonder, do you?
With anger and sadness,

Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
陛下，您对我们的敌意毫无道理！圣地亚哥骑士团侍奉基督，而您却对此有所怀疑是吗？
悲愤交加的，

大团长[From.GetFirstName]谨上

original: Expel the Knights of Santiago
I can drive the Knights of Santiago from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...
translation: 我可以将圣地亚哥骑士团赶出我的国土，没收他们的城堡。只是这么做非常不虔诚……

original: Donate 300¤ to the Santiago Knights
translation: 捐赠 300¤ 给圣地亚哥骑士团

original: Expelled the Knights of Santiago
translation: 曾驱逐圣地亚哥骑士团

original: The Knights of Calatrava
May their battles end in victory!
translation: 愿他们得到最后的胜利！

original: More sheep to the slaughter!
My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has requested to join the Knights of Calatrava in their struggle against the infidel, even though this will forever disinherit him.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]要求加入卡拉特拉瓦骑士团，与异教徒作战。即使这样做会让他失去继承权。

original: [This.GetTitledFirstName] becomes a Knight of Calatrava.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]成为了一名卡拉特拉瓦骑士。

original:
Most righteous [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the Knights of Calatrava need more castles in order to train troops and generate a supporting income. There is a suitable location in your demesne - in [FromFrom.GetName] to be specific. I am willing to pay you 100 gold in exchange for the right to construct a fortress there.

Pax Christi,
Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
最正直的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，卡拉特拉瓦骑士团需要更多的城堡来训练部队兵维持开销。我注意到，在您的直辖领地中，[FromFrom.GetName]是一个非常适合地方。我愿意出 100 金币换取您对我们在此地建筑要塞的许可。
愿基督保佑您，

大团长[From.GetFirstName]谨上

original: The Knights of Calatrava have constructed a castle in [Root.GetName]!
translation: 卡拉特拉瓦骑士团在[Root.GetName]建起了一座城堡！

original:
Your majesty, this antagonism is completely unwarranted! The Knights of Calatrava serve Christ, but, one has to wonder, do you?

With anger and sadness,
Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
陛下，您对我们的敌意毫无道理！卡拉特拉瓦骑士团侍奉基督，而您却对此有所怀疑是吗？

悲愤交加的，
大团长[From.GetFirstName]谨上

original: Expel the Knights of Calatrava
translation: 驱逐卡拉特拉瓦骑士团

original: I can drive the Knights of Calatrava from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...
translation: 我可以将卡拉特拉瓦骑士团赶出我的国土，没收他们的城堡。只是这么做非常不虔诚……

original: Donate 300¤ to the Calatrava Knights
translation: 捐赠 300¤ 给卡拉特拉瓦骑士团

original: Expelled the Knights of Calatrava
translation: 曾驱逐卡拉特拉瓦骑士团

original: Go on a Pilgrimage
Some faithful Christians choose to make a great pilgrimage at some point in their lives. The devout pilgrim is prepared to travel long distances in order to visit the holiest places of the faith.
translation: 一些虔诚的基督徒会在在一生中进行一次重要的朝圣。虔诚的朝圣将会选择去远方，拜访信仰中最神圣的圣地。

original: On pilgrimage
The character is currently away on a great pilgrimage.
translation: 这名角色正在朝圣的途中。

original: The people living in this county feel that they and their ruler are blessed by God. They are therefore less likely to revolt.
translation: 该地人民认为他们和领主受到神佑，所以他们更不倾向于叛乱。

original: You have defied the will of the holy church. They are not pleased.
translation: 你蔑视教会的意愿。他们很不开心。

original: Owns a Holy Relic
I shall go on a pilgrimage to seek God's grace at one of the holy places of Christianity.
translation: 我应当去一个基督教圣地朝圣，寻找主的恩典。

original: I will start making travel plans.

There are several different holy places that you could visit on your pilgrimage. All of them are considered most sacred by the holy church, but a somewhat closer destination might mean a safer journey.
translation: 我可以去朝圣的地方有不少。它们都是教会最为尊崇的圣所。不过近一点的目的地可能会安全一点。

original: I will go to Jerusalem and see the wonders of the Holy Land.
translation: 我将去耶路撒冷目睹圣地的奇迹。

original: I will go to Constantinople and see its great cathedrals.
translation: 我将去君士坦丁堡参观雄伟的大教堂。

original: I will go to Antioch, like the apostles.
translation: 我将和使徒们一样去安条克。

original: I will travel to Aksum, where the Ark of the Covenant lies.
translation: 我将去约柜所在的阿克苏姆。

original: I am blessed to be living in [Root.Capital.GetName], but I shall make my pilgrimage to the most holy of our Lord's places – Jerusalem!
translation: 蒙主祝福，我就居住在[Root.Capital.GetName]，但我要出发去我主最为神圣的圣地——耶路撒冷朝圣！

original: I will start making travel plans.
I am blessed to live near the holy places of our Lord in Palestine, but I shall follow in the footsteps of the apostles and make a pilgrimage to Rome.
translation: 蒙主祝福，我就居住在腓力斯丁圣地附近，但我应该追随着使徒们的足迹，去罗马朝圣。

original: I will start making travel plans.

There are a number of different holy places that you could visit on your pilgrimage. All of them are considered most sacred by the holy church, but a somewhat closer destination might mean a safer journey.
translation: 我可以去朝圣的地方有不少。它们都是教会最为尊崇的圣所。不过近一点的目的地可能会安全一点。

original: I shall visit a holy site in the West.
translation: 我应该去拜访西方的圣地。

original: I will go to one of the ancient sites, Jerusalem or Rome.
translation: 我应该去古老的圣地，耶路撒冷或是罗马。

original: A pilgrimage in the west is just as worthy as a journey to Jerusalem or Rome.
translation: 去西方的圣地朝圣并不比去耶路撒冷或者罗马差。

original: I will visit the tomb of Thomas Becket in Canterbury.
translation: 我应当去坎特伯雷拜访托马斯·贝克特的墓地。

original: I will visit Köln to see the relics of the Three Kings.
translation: 我应当去科隆参观三王的圣物。

original: I will visit the tomb of Saint James in Santiago.
translation: 我应当去圣地亚哥拜访圣雅各伯的墓地。

original: Jerusalem and Rome are the two oldest and holiest places of the [catholic.GetName] church.
translation: 耶路撒冷和罗马是[catholic.GetName]教会中最为古老也最为神圣的两个圣地。

original: I will travel to the Holy Land.
translation: 我将去圣地耶路撒冷朝圣。

original: I will go to Rome and see the tombs of the apostles.
translation: 我将去罗马参观殉道者的墓窟。

original: My things are packed, everything is in order. Soon, I shall see fair Canterbury and the tomb of Thomas Becket.
translation: 我打包好了行李，整装待发。不用多久，我就能见到美丽的坎特伯雷和托马斯·贝克特的墓地了。

original: My journey begins!
My things are packed, everything is in order. At the end of my journey the Holy Land awaits.
translation: 我打包好了行李，整装待发。旅途的终点将会是圣地耶路撒冷。

original: My journey begins!
My things are packed, everything is in order. Soon I will see Köln and the Shrine of the Three Kings.
translation: 我打包好了行李，整装待发。不用多久，我就能见到科隆和三王圣龛了。

original: My journey begins!
My things are packed, everything is in order. Soon I will walk the streets of the Eternal City and see all its marvels.
translation: 我打包好了行李，整装待发。不用多久，我就能漫步在永恒之城的街上，见证它的奇迹了。

original: My journey begins!
My things are packed, everything is in order. I am ready to walk the Way of Saint James.
translation: 我打包好了行李，整装待发，准备好踏上圣雅各伯之路。

original: My journey begins!
My things are packed, everything is in order. Soon I will stand at the Bosphorus and see the marvels of Constantinople.
translation: 我打包好了行李，整装待发。不用多久，我就会到达博斯普鲁斯，见证君士坦丁堡的奇迹了。

original: My journey begins!
My things are packed, everything is in order. Soon I will see old Aksum, the holiest place in Christian Africa.
translation: 我打包好了行李，整装待发。不用多久，我就能见到古老的阿克苏姆，阿非利加基督教最神圣的圣地。

original: My journey begins!
My things are packed, everything is in order. Ancient Antioch awaits.
translation: 我打包好了行李，整装待发。古老的安条克正在等着我！

original: My journey begins!
The rain has been pouring down for days, it's almost impossible to travel the roads. Why does the Lord punish his faithful pilgrims so?
translation: 倾盆大雨连续数日，这天气几乎没可能出行。为什么我主要如此惩罚他虔诚的朝圣者呢？

original: Blessed is [Root.GetSheHe] who perseveres under trial.
translation: 能承受试炼的人才会收到祝福！

original: This is absurd - I should have stayed home!
translation: 岂有此理，我就该呆在家里！

original: You look out across the beautiful valley stretching out before you. It would be a wonderful moment, if not for the fact that there should be no valley here. You are a pilgrim in an unfamiliar land and you have no idea where you are.
translation: 一条美丽的山谷横亘在你面前。尽管风景优美，但是你的内心却高兴不起来。这里本不应该有山谷的啊。总之现在你是一名迷路的朝圣者了，你完全不知道自己在哪里。

original: If only I hadn't listened to those useless peasants that gave me directions.
translation: 我要是没听那群没用的农民给我指的路就好了。

original: If only I'd listened more to those peasants that gave me directions.
translation: 我要是有听那些农民给我指的路就好了。

original: Deep in the night...

Sleeping at the pilgrim's inn, you dream a beautiful dream. You are walking through a dense wood, filled with the wonderful sounds and smells of nature. Little squirrels run across your path and birds sing in the trees. You keep walking through the wood, and then you notice a new and strange but familiar smell. You can't quite put your finger on what it is, though. Hmm, it's something you should know, something important... Hmm... yes, it's... it's... it's fire! You are instantly wide awake. The room is hot, you can hear the sound of crackling flames and a moment later you also hear people screaming. Indeed, the inn is on fire!
translation: 在为朝圣者准备的旅店里，你做了一个美妙的梦。你行走在满是天籁和自然气息的茂密的树林中。小松鼠从道路间穿过，鸟儿在树木上歌唱。你继续穿越这片树林，味道了一阵新奇而又熟悉的味道。你说不出这是什么，不过这是你所熟悉的某样东西，重要的东西……嗯……对了，这是……这是……火灾！你突然清醒过来。房间异常炎热，你能听到火焰噼啪的声响，随之而来的是人们的尖叫。没错，旅店着火了！

original: Help put it out!
Save yourself and let others handle it.
translation: 保护你自己，让别人来处理火灾。

original: They said this was a lawless stretch of road, but you still feel rather unlucky to be in this situation. The robbers are many and armed, and they demand that you pay a 'toll' before you are allowed to pass.
translation: 人们都说这条路法网难及，但你还是觉得碰上这种情况实在太倒霉了。一大伙武装好的强盗围住了你，要你给他们点「买路钱」才肯放你走。

original: Pay up.
Give these scoundrels the only thing they deserve – steel!
translation: 刀剑才是这群混蛋应得的！

original: The old wooden bridge has carried many pilgrims in its day. It creaks suspiciously as you step on it.
translation: 这座老木桥已经承载了许多朝圣者走过。你一踏上这座桥，它就发出可疑的嘎吱声。

original: No time to stop, I'm sure it'll hold.
translation: 没时间停下了，我相信它能撑得住。

original: Stop and help repair it.
These people deserve a stone bridge. I shall pay for it.
translation: 这里的人应该得到一座石桥。我会付钱来修建的。

original: You lay awake at night reflecting on your pilgrimage. It's an inner journey as well as a physical one, but can you be sure of which destination it will take you to? And do you even want to have that certainty?
translation: 你彻夜难眠，回想着你的朝圣之旅。这不仅是一次肉身的旅行，更是一次心灵的旅行。但是你能确定这心灵的旅途将到达何方吗？或者，你希望这旅途有一个确定的终点吗？

original: The mind wanders where it will.
It's all right there on the map. Time to get some sleep!
translation: 毫无疑问，终点就画在地图上。是时候睡觉了！

original: Travelling down a long and lonesome road, you come upon a man lying in a ditch. He seems to have been robbed and beaten up quite badly.
translation: 走过了一段漫长而孤单的路途，你见到了一个躺在水沟里的人。他看起来被人抢劫，还被狠狠地揍了一顿。

original: Bind up his wounds, help him to an inn and pay for his recovery.
translation: 帮他包扎伤口，带他去旅店并帮他垫上药钱。

original: Leave him, he's probably dead anyway.
translation: 别管他，他没准已经死了呢。

original: The flood

There have been strong rains in the area lately, and the valley that you need to cross has been transformed into a sizeable lake. The water is still rising, so you start to build a large raft in order to cross. When you're almost finished building it, a group of farmers show up and explain that they also need to cross the valley in order to get back to their homes. They bring with them a number of animals that they've rescued from the flood.
translation: 这地区进来阴雨绵绵，你前途路上的山谷已淹成座湖。水位仍在上涨，你决定造个筏子渡过去。当筏子几近完成时，一伙农夫过来告诉你他们也需要渡湖回家。随同他们的是一些从洪水中救下的牲畜。

original: I'm not sharing my raft with anyone, man or beast.
translation: 人或兽都与我和我的筏子无关。

original: Bring the farmers with all their animals.
translation: 带农民和这些动物过去。

original: Only let them bring the cats and dogs.
translation: 告诉他们只能带上猫和狗。

original: It had better not rain any more.

At your camp at night, a large group of fellow pilgrims appear. They have travelled far and are hungry and out of food. You look through your supplies, but you have only just over half a dozen loaves of bread and a few fishes.
translation: 傍晚，一群朝圣者出现在你的营地。他们看起来很疲惫，也没什么东西可吃。而你也仅有几条面包和咸鱼。

original: Share it around, it's more filling than it looks.
translation: 把食物分给大家，多少能压压饿。

original: Sorry, there's not enough for everyone.
translation: 抱歉了，这点食物不够给你们分的。

original: You have spent the last fews days of your journey on water. The vessel you are travelling on rocks gently in the breeze, as the sailors go about their business. Being on board ship is quite unlike being on land – so much is different, so many strange words for all the things here. Starboard? Abaft? Aground? What does it all mean?
translation: 你最后几日的旅途是在海上度过的。船随着海风晃动，水手们在甲板上忙碌着。陆地和船上是如此不同，你听着他们叫着「右舷」、「船尾」、「搁浅」……天知道是什么意思。

original: This is fascinating. I must take the opportunity to learn.
translation: 太有意思了，我得赶紧学学。

original: This does not concern me. I will spend my time in prayer.
translation: 这对我来说毫无意义，不如把时间用于祈祷。

original: As you stop to make camp near a river crossing along with other pilgrims, you observe a group of builders working on a new bridge just upstream. You walk up to them and see that the arches of the bridge are already half completed. The master builder notices your interest and walks up to you and offers to tell you about the construction techniques they are using.
translation: 同其他朝圣者在河边扎营，你注意到一些人正在上游修桥，过去看的时候，桥拱已经搭了一半，负责人见你如此有兴趣，过来和你聊起了这次用到的建造技术。

original: Yes, tell me more about this.
Nobles build castles. This is for peasants.

The journey is long and hard. Your feet are sore, and your back as well. Far from the castle kitchens the food is barely edible, and on top of that you seem to feel cold all the time. Perhaps you were not quite cut out for this pilgrimage thing?
translation: 旅程漫长而艰辛，你感到腰酸背痛，离开了城堡的厨房你都不知道什么能吃，最该死的是这刺骨的寒冷。你不确定是不是要停止这次朝圣。

original: My faith will see me through.
translation: 我的信念会让我度过难关。

original: Maybe this was a bad idea. I'll stay and rest for a while.
translation: 也许这是个坏主意，我要停下来歇会儿。

original: As you pass through a small village along the pilgrim's path, an old woman comes up to you. She has recognized you as a pilgrim and explains that her daughter and her family live close to your destination. They are suffering hard times and she asks you to bring them a large purse of money.
translation: 朝圣的旅途中，你经过一个小村，一个老妇径直走过来。她知道你是朝圣者，她的家里离你要去的地方很近，希望你能给家人捎一大笔钱改善生活。

original: Of course I will help you.
Of course I will help you (secretly add some money of your own).
translation: 没问题，我乐意效劳（悄悄的添上自己的钱）。

original: Of course I will help you (lie and keep the money for yourself).
translation: 没问题，我乐意效劳（欺骗她，把钱据为己有）。

original: This is not my business, old crone.
There is a star shining unusually bright in the clear sky. You see it every night, and its position coincides more or less with the direction to the destination of your pilgrimage.
translation: 每晚你都发现有颗星亮得不同寻常，它的位置不偏不倚正好在你朝圣的方向。

original: The Lord is showing me the way.
It's a bright star, so what?
Riders approach...

Thundering hooves are heard down the road. The pilgrims look with apprehension at the rising dust cloud. As the riders close, steel armour and steel-tipped lances reflect the bright sunlight. The tension rises, but then a collective sigh of relief is heard as the banner of the holy knights is seen flying above the mass of armored men. The knights halt before the pilgrims and graciously offer to accompany you on the road.
translation: 伴着如雷的马蹄声，朝圣者们不安的看着漫天飞扬的尘土。他们来的很快，盔甲锃亮，钢枪笔挺。紧张的气氛蔓延开来，等大家看到圣骑士团的旗帜才舒了一口气。骑士们在朝圣队伍前停下，提出要一路护送朝圣队伍。

original: Praised be [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]! A most welcome escort!
Never trust armed men who appear out of nowhere.
translation: 来路不明的军队不能信任。

original: As the evening approaches after a long day on the road, you come upon several campfires. Around the fires you find a group of holy knights, resting after a long day's ride. They invite you to share their meal and trade stories.
translation: 一天的长途跋涉之后，夜幕再次降临，你向几处篝火走去。火旁是一些骑士团的人在歇脚，他们热情邀请你加入，分享晚餐和路上的见闻。

original: Discuss theology with the knights.
Trade stories of war.

During the last couple of days, you have made company on the road with a holy knight on his way to the same destination. You have lively and interesting conversations, and you find that you have many things in common.
translation: 在最后的两天里，你与同路的一位圣骑士做伴。你们有聊不完的话题，发现彼此有很多共同点。

original: How unexpected, to make a new friend this far from home.
translation: 难以置信，在异国他乡还能交个新朋友。

original: I have no need for friends.
[Root.GetTitledName] gains a new friend.
You have made friends with [From.GetTitledName].
Great!
Canterbury

You have finally arrived at Canterbury! It is beautifully situated on the river Stour in Kent in southeast England. The town itself and the surrounding meadows are full of pilgrims from all over Europe. You start to make your way through the hustle and bustle, eager to see the famous cathedral and contemplate the tomb of the martyr Thomas Becket, who was viciously murdered inside the cathedral itself.
translation: 你终于到达了坎特伯雷！它位于英格兰东南部肯特郡的斯陶尔河畔，城镇和周边的草地上聚集了来自欧洲各地的朝圣者，你挤进喧嚣的人群，迫不及待的想见证宏伟的大教堂和殉道者托马斯·贝克特的雕像，据说他就是在圣堂里被残杀的。

original: A green and pleasant land!
Jerusalem

You have finally arrived at Jerusalem! Passing by the Mount of Olives, you enter through the city gate and are immediately overcome by a feeling of having made a truly epic journey. The city is filled with people of all creeds and colors, the air heavy with smells of strange spices and foreign plants. You make your way through the throng of people and animals, excited by the knowledge that you are now close to the Via Dolorosa and the other holy places. You plan to also visit the Church of the Nativity in Bethlehem, but first of all you need to find someplace to stay. After all, you wouldn't want to be forced to sleep in a stable, would you?
translation: 你终于抵达了耶路撒冷！从橄榄山经过，进入城门的时刻，你再也压抑不住内心的激动，一路的艰辛都是值得的。城里有各种的肤色和不同信仰的人，空气中弥漫着神秘的香料和奇花异草的味道。你在人畜如流的街上穿行，离「苦路」和其他的伟大圣迹如此之近，光想到这点就让你兴奋不已。你本打算再去伯利恒瞻仰诞生地教堂，但当务之急是找一处合适的地方住下来，毕竟你也不想睡在马厩，不是吗？

original: O Jerusalem, Jerusalem!
Köln

You have finally arrived at Köln! The mighty cathedral housing the relics of the Three Kings is still under construction, but it is an impressive structure nonetheless. The city itself lies on the mighty river Rhine, and busy commerce mingles with the flow of pilgrims.
translation: 你终于抵达了科隆！「三王圣龛」所在的宏伟大教堂虽然正在施工，仍令人印象深刻。科隆坐落在奔腾的莱茵河畔，来往商旅及朝圣者川流不息。

original: I will pray at the Shrine of the Three Kings!
translation: 我要在三王圣龛前祈祷！

original: Rome

You have finally arrived at Rome! As you enter the Eternal City, you are struck by the many ancient buildings and monuments that you pass by. It is truly impressive, and you try to imagine how the apostles felt when they first came here on their holy mission at a time when the city's power was at its peak. Though large areas seem to be depopulated, the city still boasts an impressive population concentrated around the Tiber river. The holy sites you want to visit are primarily the basilicas of Saint Peter and Saint Paul, as well as other early churches and places connected to the martyrs. You start making your way to the center of the city, hoping that you won't get lost in traffic as the crowds start to get more dense.
translation: 你终于抵达了罗马！一步入这座不朽之城，你立即被眼前众多的古老建筑和纪念碑所深深震撼。遥想最初的使徒来此传道，罗马的权势正如日中天，他们作何想呢？尽管有大片荒废的城区，罗马城沿台伯河两岸聚居的庞大人口值得称道。除了圣伯多禄大教堂和圣保禄大教堂，一些早期的圣所和殉道者遗迹也值得一看。在人流纷至、交通堵塞之前，赶紧先去市中心吧。

original: A thousand roads lead men forever to Rome!
Santiago

You have finally arrived at Santiago, the oldest major pilgrimage site in the West. It is an inland town close to the Atlantic Ocean, with origins going back at least to the Roman Empire. The fabled Way of Saint James is a long road to travel, and you have passed through many towns and villages on your way here.

The legend holds that as Saint James' remains were brought here by ship from Jerusalem, they were lost at sea due to a storm. But soon after they were miraculously washed ashore, covered in scallops. Because of this, scallop shells have become a popular souvenir among pilgrims.

Your mind dwells on the legends of this holy place, as you make your way through the crowds towards the center of town.
translation:
你终于抵达了圣地亚哥，西欧最古老的朝圣地！这是一个靠近大西洋的内陆城镇，历史至少能追溯到罗马帝国时期。沿家喻户晓的圣雅各伯之路走来，你都记不清经过了多少村镇，这旅途可真长！

根据传说，圣雅各伯的遗骨本应经海路从耶路撒冷移来此处，不幸船队遭受风暴，散佚大海，而后竟又奇迹般地包裹在扇贝里，被海浪冲上沙滩。就这样，贝壳成了朝圣者们追捧的纪念品。

你对圣地的种种圣迹铭感于心，穿过人群向城中心走去。

original: I must remember to bring a seashell home with me!
Constantinople

You have finally arrived at Constantinople! The city is enormous, dwarfing all other cities that you've seen. There is a bustle of people, commerce, sounds and smells that overpower your senses and leave you quite dizzy. As you make your way through the streets in order to find a place to stay, you are impressed by scale and number of the ancient churches and monuments that appear everywhere along your path.\n\nYou press on through the crowds, eager to finally look upon such fabled churches as the Hagia Sofia and the Saint George.
translation: 你终于抵达了君士坦丁堡！这座巨城的规模之大，让你有生以来见过的所有城市都相形见绌。人群的喧嚣声，小贩的叫卖声，空气中弥漫的各种气味，它们纷至沓来，压倒了你的所有感官，你都无法思考了。你在人群中穿行，寻找过夜的去处，一路上所见的古建筑或纪念碑不胜枚举，它们的规模之大、数量之多令你震惊。\n\n拥挤的人潮无法挡住你急切的脚步，你知道自己快见到传说中的圣索菲亚大教堂和圣乔治大教堂了。

original: Ah, the City of Constantine!
Aksum

You have finally arrived at Aksum! This is one of the oldest centers of the Christian faith, and it is here that the Ark of the Covenant is kept, guarded by monks inside the Church of Our Lady Mary of Zion. Though no longer the great city it once was, Aksum is still an important center of pilgrimage, and you can see many travellers in the streets.
translation: 你终于抵达了阿克苏姆！这是最古老的基督教中心之一，约柜就保存于此——位于僧侣们守护的「郇山的玛丽」教堂中。尽管不复往日荣光，阿克苏姆仍然是朝圣者们重要的聚集地之一，往来的行旅川流不息。

original: It is beautiful, ancient Aksum!
Antioch

You have finally arrived at Antioch! This is the oldest city of Christianity, the first place where people actually began to call themselves 'Christian'. Saint Peter and Saint Paul both worked here, as did Saint Ignatius. It is a place where early Christendom was formed and defined, and it later expanded from here, westwards, to Rome and beyond.\n\nAs your feet tread the ancient streets of Antioch, you can feel the history and tradition in the air around you.
translation: 你终于抵达了安条克！这里是为最古老的基督教圣城之一，就是在这里人们开始自称「基督徒」。圣伯多禄、圣保禄以及圣依纳爵曾在此传教。此地亦为最早建立基督教区的地方，它成为范式并逐渐推广到了西方，罗马就是其中典型。\n\n漫步安条克的古老街道，你感觉自己被历史和传统环绕着。

original: A great and ancient city!

As you walk around on this holy ground, you ponder the secrets and the essence of God. The teachings of the holy church have never felt more relevant to you than now. Imagine the knowledge contained in the scriptures stored here!
translation: 你在圣地漫步，沉浸于神性本质和内在的冥思。多年司侍我主的意义从未像现在这么明了。此地馆藏的经传又蕴涵着怎样的智慧啊！

original: The way to Heaven is through study.
translation: 学习是开启天国的钥匙。

original: No, I shall spend my time praying.

The saints, this holy ground, how it all moves my soul! I realize now that all my life up to this point has only been a preparation for this journey. How wondrous that the light of the Lord truly shines in me, a poor sinner. From now on I shall always do His work.
translation: 圣人、圣地，它们根植入我的灵魂！我意识到往昔的种种不过为今日而铺垫，主的荣光已照耀我的罪身，从此我愿永远承行他的旨意。

original: Praise [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!

Traveling all this way to see the holy places, you had hoped for more than this. It's just lots of people, some churches and a few bones that really look quite suspicious. Before coming, you had read the exalted stories of other pilgrims, but this just isn't like they described it.
translation: 你不远万里朝圣，现在深感失望，此行所见不过嘈杂的人群，些许教堂和几块来历可疑的骨头，这可和临行前所读的几部朝圣者手记出神入化的描述大相径庭。

original: That's it?

As you approach the holy temple, you overhear a theological discussion between several priests. You stop and eagerly engage them in conversation, expanding upon several of your favorite topics. They are very impressed by your knowledge and invite you to hold a lecture for a group of assembled religious scholars.
translation: 步入圣殿时，你无意听见几位教士的神学讨论。你为之吸引停步，参与讨论并把话题引向了几个你感兴趣的主题。他们被你的学识折服并极力邀请你为神职人员集中讲道。

original: I will be most pleased to share my knowledge.

The bustling mass of pilgrims is impressive, as are the many languages, colors and ways of dress present. People come here from west, east, north and south. You are standing at a place where the roads meet, and that is where people and ideas meet.
translation: 各种语言、肤色和服饰混杂，来自天南海北的人们汇成的朝圣队伍庞大而嘈杂，令人印象深刻。你伫立在道路的交汇点——人流和思想的交汇点。

original: Take the opportunity to observe different languages and customs.
translation: 借机掌握外语，领略各地风俗。

original: Take the opportunity to meet new people.

The stories of other pilgrims all spoke of how impressive this place is. Now that you can see it with your own eyes, you can only join in their praise. You are glad that you came here, to one of Christianity's holiest places.
translation: 所有朝圣者都在称颂此地的不凡，现在你终于眼见，不由得也心生赞叹。你很高兴能来到这里——踏上基督教徒的圣地之一。

original: It was well worth the journey!
So far from home, all alone, and so many lovely people in the same situation as me. It's a great opportunity for some fun, isn't it?
translation: 忍受旅途的孤寂，太多可爱的人像我一样，不远万里来此，不如一起找点乐子吧？

original: What's the harm?
That's not what I'm here for.

This holy place is bustling with pilgrims from all over the world, and a myriad of accents and languages mingle in the parks and plazas. In this great cultural melting pot, should there not also be room for me to express who I really am?
translation: 圣地熙熙攘攘的挤满了来自世界各地的人，公园和广场混杂着各种语言和口音的叫嚷此起彼伏。在这个文化的大熔炉，未必有展现本我的空间吧？

original: The folks at home will never know.
No, it's a sin!
The healers

Near the holy sites, you hear rumors of a group of monks with strange cures for diseases. Eagerly, you seek them out, hoping against hope that they may aid you. Once in their care you are fed strange potions, foods and herbs. You are unconscious or delirious during most of the process and remember few details, but at last you wake up to find that you have been miraculously healed of your ills.
translation: 在圣地，你听到关于用古怪方法治病的僧侣团体的传闻。你抱着一线希望找到了他们，希望能得到救助。你只剩下治疗期间的记忆片段——大部分时间你都昏迷不醒或神志不清——悉心的护理、古怪的药剂、草药和食物，总之你清醒时发现自己被奇迹般治愈了。

original: God's hand touched me and healed me.
translation: 神之手赐我抚摩，愈我疾苦。

original: These monks really know their stuff.
I must learn more of this secret magic.
translation: 我得深入了解这种秘法。

original: All these magnificent temples built in your honor! Oh the glory! And all these pilgrims - finally you may revel in their adulation. Perhaps you should reveal yourself to the masses who have come to worship you?
translation: 宏伟的圣殿因你的名而荣耀，永恒的主啊！愿朝圣者的尊崇终能取悦你！也许你将现身于膜拜你的人群？

original: Speak to them!
No, I shall enjoy this glorious time in silence.
translation: 不，此刻的欢悦与沉默同在。

original: You have come to visit the holy sites and show your devotion. But surely, there is no harm in having a little fun first?
translation: 你完成了朝圣并展现了你的虔诚。不妨找点乐子？

original: To the tavern!
No... must control... myself...

Jerusalem, what a fascinating place! A holy place for three great religions, and the city and surrounding area are full of monuments giving tribute to God. Somehow when you look closer, they don't seem all that different. It rather makes you think, doesn't it?
translation: 耶路撒冷，好一个迷人的地方！是为三种信仰共同的圣地，随处可见奉献给神的纪念碑、雕塑和其它作品。当你细细地省视它们，从某种意义上三教并无迥异。就共同启发你思考这一点而言，不是吗？

original: Muhammad was a great thinker.
translation: 穆罕默德是个伟大的思想家。

original: Jesus was a Jew, wasn't he?
Blasphemous fools! Do they not know their Lord? How dare they throw you out of your own temple?
translation: 亵渎神明的傻瓜！他们不信上帝吗？怎么敢把你从神庙赶出来？

original: I shall have my vengeance.
You have finally returned from your pilgrimage. It was a rewarding and interesting journey, and you'd do it all again if you could. Still, it's good to be back home.
translation: 你终于结束朝圣回家了。这段旅程有趣而益处良多，有机会的话你还愿意再去一次。不过，回家的感觉真好。

original: A great experience!

You have finally returned from your pilgrimage. It didn't turn out quite as expected, and perhaps you shouldn't have gone there in the first place. But there's no changing it now, at least you're home again and can start forgetting about it.
translation: 你终于结束朝圣回家。这次旅程让你很失望，后悔一开始就不该出发。不过现在已经于事无补，好在你已经回家了，不如忘了它吧。

original: I won't tell my family what really happened out there.
translation: 我不会告诉家里人真相的。

original: You have finally returned from your pilgrimage. Though the insolent rats did not recognize you or pay you proper homage, it was still an enlightening experience. Now there is plenty of time to prepare the day of reckoning.
translation: 你终于结束朝圣回家了。尽管家中的粗野的老鼠未给你丝毫敬意——肆无忌惮的窜来窜去，这次旅程仍让你感觉获益匪浅。现在有大把时间准备开始清帐了。

original: They will pay for worshipping false idols.
translation: 他们会为错误的信仰付出代价。

original: §Y[Actor.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName]§W can afford to lose §Y$WEALTH$§!¤ wealth
Request Money
Ask §Y[Actor.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName]§W for §Y$WEALTH$§!¤ money at the cost of §Y$PIETY$§! [Player.Religion.GetPietyName].
The head of a religion can grant rulers he likes enough some money. However, the very act of asking will cost you [Player.Religion.GetPietyName].
translation: 宗教首领可以给他所赏识的领主赏赐。不过，这种请求通常会花费[Player.Religion.GetPietyName]。

original: Request for Money Accepted
§Y[Actor.GetBestName]§! has received a gift from §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!
Request for money declined
§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! has declined a request to gift §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§!
[Actor.GetBestName] has presented a request for §Y$COST$§W to us!
translation: [Actor.GetBestName]向我们提出请求 §Y$COST$§W 资助的请求！

original: Please accept my request of §Y$COST$§!.
translation: 请同意我请求 §Y$COST$§! 资助的请求。

original: Of course I will give you some funds to help spread the Faith in your realm. I trust §Y[GetDiploGiftSize]§!¤ will do?
translation: 我当然会资助你在领地的布道。§Y[GetDiploGiftSize]§!¤ 够不够？

original: Your request for §Y[GetDiploGiftSize]§!¤ is denied. I doubt you would use the money to aid the Faith.
translation: 你要求的 §Y[GetDiploGiftSize]§!¤ 已被拒绝。我们怀疑你不会把这笔钱用在资助信仰上。

original: Asked for Money
You have Free Investiture
translation: 你施行了自主神职叙任权

original: You supported this Pope's election
translation: 你襄助了这位教宗的选举

original: Request Crusade
Ask §Y[Actor.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName]§W to launch a [Actor.Religion.GetCrusadeName]. This will cost you [Player.Religion.GetPietyName].
translation: 请求§Y[Actor.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName]§W发动一场[Actor.Religion.GetCrusadeName]。这将消耗你的[Player.Religion.GetPietyName]。

original: The head of a religion can start a [Actor.Religion.GetCrusadeName] at your request. However, the very act of asking will cost you [Player.Religion.GetPietyName].
translation: 宗教领袖可以应你的请求发动一场[Actor.Religion.GetCrusadeName]。然而，这将花费你的[Player.Religion.GetPietyName]。

original: Asked for Religious War
The defenders of §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§! successfully raided the camps of the besiegers, inflicting heavy casualties.
translation: §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§!的守军成功突袭了围攻方的营地，造成重大损失。

original: The defenders of §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§! launched an unsuccessful raid against the besiegers, taking heavy losses in the attempt.
translation: §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§!的守军对围攻方的突袭失败，留下满地尸体后仓皇退却。

original: The defenders of §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§! executed captives on the wall, angering the besiegers and strengthening their resolve.
translation: §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§!的守军在城墙上处决了俘虏，被激怒的围攻方增强了破城的决心。

original: Rumors of a traitor working with the besiegers has eroded the morale of the defenders of §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§!.
translation: 城中有叛徒与围攻方暗通款曲的谣言侵蚀了§Y[From.Siege.GetName]§!守军的士气。

original: An outbreak of disease in the camps outside the walls of §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§! has killed many of the besiegers.
translation: 疫病在§Y[From.Siege.GetName]§!城外的营地里流行，围攻方许多人因此丧命。

original: Large numbers of the famished defenders of §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§! have succumbed to starvation.
translation: §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§!的守军有很多人死于食物匮乏导致的饥馑。

original: Food and supplies have been smuggled into §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§!, increasing the morale of the defenders.
translation: 食物和其他补给被走私进§Y[From.Siege.GetName]§! ，极大鼓舞了守军的士气。

original: Bandits have raided the siege camps outside §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§!, killing many of the besieging soldiers.
translation: 强盗突袭了§Y[From.Siege.GetName]§!外的围攻方军营，许多士兵因此丧命。

original: Tuscan raiders have attacked the siege camps outside §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§!, killing many of the besieging soldiers.
translation: 托斯卡纳劫掠者攻击了§Y[From.Siege.GetName]§!外的围攻方军营，许多士兵因此丧命。

original: Tuscan raiders have attacked the siege camps outside §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§!, but they were startled by a surprise counter attack.
translation: 托斯卡纳劫掠者攻击了§Y[From.Siege.GetName]§!外的围攻方军营，但卓有成效的反击大大震慑了他们。

original: Encouraged by a holy omen, the emboldened Christian defenders of §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§! caused havoc on the pagan siege lines in a daring raid.
translation: 被神圣的预兆所鼓舞，斗志激昂的§Y[From.Siege.GetName]§!基督徒守军发起大胆的突袭，重挫了措手不及的异教徒军队。

original: After finding a holy relic, the emboldened Christian defenders of §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§! caused havoc on the Muslim siege lines in a daring raid.
translation: 深受寻获圣物一事的鼓舞，斗志激昂的§Y[From.Siege.GetName]§!基督徒守军发起大胆的突袭，重挫了措手不及的穆斯林军队。

original: A Sufi mystic has heartened the Muslim defenders of §Y[From.Siege.GetName]§!, and they have inflicted severe losses on the besieging infidels.
translation: 一个苏菲教派神秘主义者鼓舞了§Y[From.Siege.GetName]§!的穆斯林守军，他们给围攻的异教徒造成了严重的伤亡。

original: Repay the [Root.GoldOwedToJews]¤ loan
Asked for excommunication
Asked to lift excommunication
Asked for invasion
Asked for divorce
Requires Papal Investiture
Nominate Bishop
Ask §Y[Actor.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName]§W to choose your selected courtier as the next bishop for one of your churches. This will cost you Piety.
translation: 请求§Y[Actor.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName]§W选择你推荐的廷臣为你名下某教堂的下任主教。这将花费你的虔诚。

original: Request for Bishop Nomination Accepted
translation: 主教提名的请求被获准

original: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W nominated a bishop to §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W
translation: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W向§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W提议任命一名主教，获得批准。

original: Request for Bishop Nomination Declined
translation: 提名主教的请求被拒绝

original: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W nominated a bishop to §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W
[Actor.GetBestName] has presented a nomination for bishopric to us!
translation: [Actor.GetBestName]向我们提交了一份教区主教的提名！

original: Please accept my nomination of this bishop.
translation: 请准许我对这名主教的提名。

original: I have accepted your request of nomination for bishopric.
translation: 我准许你对这名主教的提名请求。

original: I have refused your request of nomination for bishopric.
translation: 我拒绝了你所提名的的主教人选。

original: Asked to Nominate Bishop
The College of Cardinals
Back to the Religion View

Money in the Campaign Fund will increase your influence with the Papacy and make your candidate more likely to be elected the next $RULER_TITLE$. You can freely adjust the amount until the next $RULER_TITLE$ is elected, when the Fund will be used up in the election campaign.
translation: 竞选资金里的财富会提升你对教廷的影响力，并让你的候选人更有可能被选为下一位$RULER_TITLE$。你可以在下一位$RULER_TITLE$的选举结果公布之前随意调整数量。届时，这笔资金将被全部用于竞选活动。

original: Your liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has issued a decree calling for the expulsion of all unlanded Jews from the entire realm, citing various grievances committed by them against the Crown.
translation: 你的领主，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，颁布法令驱逐境内所有无封地的犹太人，他们藐视王权并造成诸般怨忿。

original: I see.
Alas, this means my loan cannot be repaid...
translation: 哎呀，就是说我的贷款不用还了吗……

original: Your liege, [Root.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName], has decided to rescind the decree calling for the expulsion of all Jews. They are now once more permitted to live and work within the borders of the realm.
translation: [Root.TopLiege.GetTitledFirstName]，你的领主已经决定撤回驱逐犹太人的法令。他们能再一次合法地在我国居住和工作了。

original: Fools!
Who needs culture?
Must I do everything myself?
Mu'tazilite
This character is an adherent of the Sunni Mu'tazila school of theology, placing emphasis on rationality, reason and free will.
translation: 此人属于逊尼派穆尔太齐赖教派，他们推崇理智、理性和自由意志。

original: Ash'ari
This character is an adherent of the Sunni Ash'ari school of theology, placing emphasis on tradition, revelation and occasionalism.
translation: 此人属于逊尼派艾什尔里教派，他们因袭传统，注重天启说和偶因论。

original: You embrace the Mu'tazila school of theology.
translation: 你皈依了穆尔太齐赖教派。

original: The Mu'tazila school of theology holds that the Qur'an was created and is not eternal, and that the injunctions of Allah are accessible to rational thought and inquiry. Influenced by this school, the learned and wise men of your realm have become more productive in their scientific pursuits.
translation: 穆尔太齐赖教派认为古兰经并非一成不变而是可以被创造的，同时允许对安拉的诫令进行理性思考甚至质疑。受此教派影响，境内有教养的学者们在科学追求方面更有创造力了。

original: This is the right path.
You embrace the Ash'ari school of theology.
translation: 你皈依了艾什尔里教派。

original: The Ash'ari school of theology holds that the Qur'an is eternal and exact, that full comprehension of Allah is beyond human understanding and that moral truths can only be taught by means of revelation. The clergy of your realm have fully embraced this school, leading to a surge in religious fervor.
translation: 艾什尔里教派认为古兰经是精确而永恒的，安拉的内涵远远超越了人类理解能力的极限，明辨是非的真理只能通过启示传习。境内的神职人员完全皈依了该教派，导致宗教热情高涨。

original: Embrace the Mu'tazila School
You embrace Mu'tazila, a Sunni school of theology that emphasizes rationality, reason and free will. This will benefit your research, but members of the opposing Ash'ari school will disapprove.
translation: 你皈依了穆尔太齐赖——逊尼派的一支，主张理智、理性和自由意志。这对你的科研有好处，但与之对立的艾什尔里派信徒会不高兴。

original: Embrace the Ash'ari School
You embrace Ash'ari, a Sunni school of theology that emphasizes tradition, revelation and occasionalism. This will increase your piety, but members of the opposing Mu'tazila school will disapprove.
translation: 你皈依了艾什尔里——逊尼派的一支，他们因袭传统，注重天启说和偶因论。这将有助积累你的虔诚，但与之对立的穆尔太齐赖派信徒会不高兴。

original: Rejected School

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is a follower of the Mu'tazila school of theology, which stands in direct opposition to the Ash'ari school which you have pledged yourself to. Perhaps you should have a word with [From.GetHerHim].
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]是穆尔太齐赖派的追随者，与你信奉的艾什尔里教派势同水火。也许你应该同[From.GetHerHim]谈谈。

original: Yes, I will enlighten [From.GetHerHim].
No, it is not my concern.
You ask your vassal to switch theological school.

It has come to my attention that you're a follower of the heretical Mu'tazila school. Their tenets and philosophies are an affront to Allah and the teachings of the Prophet (peace be upon him). I urge you instead to embrace the Ash'ari doctrine.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
我注意到你正追随异端穆尔太齐赖教派，他们的教义和观点亵渎了安拉和先知（愿主福安之）的教导。我迫切要求你改奉艾什尔里派的信条。

此致，
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Yes, perhaps it would be best...
Never!
You send word that you agree to adopt the Ash'ari school.
translation: 你回信郑重表示皈依艾什尔里教派。

original:
As always, my liege, your wisdom far exceeds my own. If you think it best, I will abandon the Mu'tazila teachings and instead embrace the doctrines of Ash'ari.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
一如既往，大人，您的智慧远超于我。既然是您的正确指示，我将抛弃穆尔太齐赖派的教义而改奉艾什尔里派的信条。

此致，
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: A wise choice.
You send word that you refuse to adopt the Ash'ari school.
translation: 你回信表示拒绝改信艾什尔里教派。

original:
You may be my liege in the mortal world, but do not presume to dictate how I lead my spiritual life. That is between me, Allah and the Prophet (peace be upon them). I have no intention of adopting the heretical ways of the Ash'ari school.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
您只是我在俗世的名义领主，无权擅自干涉我的宗教信仰自由。这是我与安拉及先知（愿主福安之）的事。我不打算改信异端——艾什尔里教派。

此致，
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: That impudent...!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is a follower of the Ash'ari school of theology, which stands in direct opposition to the Mu'tazila school which you have pledged yourself to. Perhaps you should have a word with [From.GetHerHim].
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]是艾什尔里教派的追随者。与你信奉的穆尔太齐赖教派势同水火。也许你应该同[From.GetHerHim]谈谈。

original: Yes, I will enlighten [From.GetHerHim].
No, it is not my concern.
You ask your vassal to switch theological school.

It has come to my attention that you're a follower of the misguided Ash'ari school. Their tenets and philosophies are an affront to Allah and the teachings of the Prophet (peace be upon him). I urge you instead to embrace the Mu'tazila doctrine.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
我注意到你正追随异端艾什尔里教派，他们的教义和观点亵渎了安拉和先知（愿主福安之）的教导。我迫切要求你改奉穆尔太齐赖派的信条。

此致，
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Yes, perhaps it would be best...
Never!
You send word that you agree to adopt the Mu'tazila school.
translation: 你回信郑重表示皈依穆尔太齐赖教派。

original:
As always, my liege, your wisdom far exceeds my own. If you think it best, I will abandon the Ash'ari teachings and instead embrace the doctrines of Mu'tazila.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
一如既往，大人，您的智慧远超于我。既然是您的正确指示，我将抛弃艾什尔里派的教义而改奉穆尔太齐赖派的信条。

此致，
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: A wise choice.
You send word that you refuse to adopt the Mu'tazila school.
translation: 你回信表示拒绝改信穆尔太齐赖教派。

original:
You may be my liege in the mortal world, but do not presume to dictate how I lead my spiritual life. That is between me, Allah and the Prophet (peace be upon them). I have no intention of adopting the heretical ways of the Mu'tazila school.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
您只是我在俗世的名义领主，无权擅自干涉我的宗教信仰自由。这是我与安拉及先知（愿主福安之）的事。我不打算改信异端——穆尔太齐赖教派。

此致，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: That impudent...!

Given your cynical nature, you have begun to question some of the basic tenets of the Ash'ari school of theology as of late. The more you look at the teachings of the opposing Mu'tazila school, the more they seem to make sense...
translation: 由于愤世嫉俗，你开始质疑艾什尔里教派的一些基本教义。你对敌对教派穆尔太齐赖的教义了解越多，越觉得它更有道理……

original: Perhaps I have been walking the wrong path...
No! I must purge my mind of such heretical thoughts.
translation: 不行！我要清除掉脑中这些异端思想。

original: Given your zealous nature, you have begun to question some of the basic tenets of the Mu'tazila school of theology as of late. The more you look at the teachings of the opposing Ash'ari school, the more they seem to make sense...
translation: 由于对信仰的极端狂热，你开始质疑穆尔太齐赖教派的一些基本教义。你对敌对教派艾什尔里的教义了解越多，越觉得它更有道理……

original: No! I must purge my mind of such misguided notions.
translation: 不行！我要清除掉脑中这些错误观念。

original: Rebels killed §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! after taking §Y[FromFrom.GetName]§! in §Y[FromFrom.County.GetName]§!.
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledName]§!在叛军攻下§Y[FromFrom.County.GetName]§!地区的§Y[FromFrom.GetName]§!后被杀害。

original: Achievement gained!
You unlocked $ACHIEVEMENT$!

As you are leading your troops on campaign, one day a sergeant from your army rides up and asks to speak to you. He presents you with a small box containing a holy relic, and explains that it was found by a foraging party in the ashes of a nearby church.
translation: 领军行进中的某日，队伍中一名军士策马而出向你求见。他向你展示了一个装有圣物的小盒子，说是征粮队在附近教堂的废墟里找到的。

original: This shall henceforth be an heirloom of my family.
translation: 这将成为我的家传宝物。

original: I will give it to the local church back home.
translation: 我要把它还给本地教堂。

original: One day at the market, a strange man comes up to you and offers to sell to you what he swears is a finger of Saint John the Baptist. You look at it carefully, and it does indeed seem to be a set of old human bones.
translation: 某天，市场上有一个神秘人走近你，极力兜售一段指骨——他坚称其属于洗者若翰。你仔细地看了看，这确实像一段老人的骨头。

original: I must purchase this most holy relic!
translation: 我必须买下如此珍贵的圣物！

original: This can be anyone's finger.
translation: 谁知道这是哪儿来的骨头。

original: A priest has arrived and asked for an audience. After being shown in, he explains that his small church can no longer protect the holy relic it holds, due to robbers plaguing the countryside. He therefore asks for your family to keep it.
translation: 一个司祭请求接见。受引见后，他解释道乡间盗贼肆虐，他所在的小教堂无法保证所供奉圣物的安全，所以请求你的家族代为保管。

original: Fear not, we shall protect it.

That old relic that has been in your family's care... you realize you haven't seen it around it in a very long time. You look for it, but you can't find it anywhere. Why do these things always happen to you?
translation: 这个古老的圣物开始由你的家族守护……过了一段时间，你突然想起来好久没看见过它了，到处寻找却不见其踪影。为什么这些事总发生在我身上？

original: Better not mention this to anyone.
Enemy raiders have attacked the small chapel where your family relic was kept. The priest tending the chapel tried to stop them but was slain on the doorstep.
translation: 掠袭者攻击了供奉有你先祖遗骸的礼拜堂。主持的司祭试图阻止他们，却在门口被残杀。

original: Thieves and murderers!

Disaster, My [Root.GetLordLady]! Your court chaplain was attacked by a stray dog while he was carrying your family's relic shrine, and the holy bones fell out on the floor. And... well, the dog... we found it burying the bones in the yard among a lot of other bones stolen from the kitchens. Now it's impossible to sort out what is what.
translation: 大事不好，我的[Root.GetLordLady]！您的家族教堂闯入了一只野狗，咬伤了宫廷司祭，并叼走了您先祖的骨匣，骨片掉了一地。还有……那个，这狗……它把抢走的骨头埋在了后院，和先前从厨房偷走的骨头混在一起，我们根本无法分辩出来啥是啥。

original: Curses! My ancestors will be turning in their graves.
translation: 天杀的！ 我的先祖会在坟墓中气的打滚的。

original: Just put any old bones in there, no one will know the difference.
translation: 放些年头久的骨头回去，没人会知道的。

original: Hang on, let me see...

Your court chaplain comes to you and suggests that the family relic could be used to help heal your pains. A night of prayers and the presence of this holy item might bring the Lord's attention to you and drive the sickness out.
translation: 你的宫廷司祭告诉你，家族圣物有助你病痛的痊愈。圣物见证下的整夜祈祷会引来上帝的垂怜，将所有不适祛除。

original: Our holy relic will surely be my salvation!
Bring a healer but keep those old bones away from me.
translation: 带医生来见我，而不是骨头。

original: As the farmers prepare for sowing their spring crops, your court chaplain suggests that you bring out the holy relic in procession and bless the fields. Surely, this would increase the likelihood of a bountiful harvest this year.
translation: 正值农民春耕播种时节，宫廷司祭建议你请出圣物，给田地赐福。这样肯定会迎来丰收的一年。

original: Yes, it will bless the land and pacify the peasants.
translation: 是的，既能赐福田地，又能安抚农民。

original: No, I don't think it would do any good.

Fingers of Saint John the Baptist, discount price for boxes of ten!\nA bishop brings to your attention that false relics are being sold at the market at great profits. They do of course generate a lot of commerce and taxes, but still, it's rather immoral and blasphemous.
translation: 谎称装有洗者圣若翰的指骨，一个盒子能卖出十倍的价格！\n一名主教向你指出，假圣髑的买卖利润很大，确实能繁荣市场并增加税收，但无法掩盖这一行为的不道德，这也是对神明的大不敬。

original: Crack down on these criminals!
Leave them be.
Get in on the business!
A local friar has petitioned you to donate your family relic to the Church. After all, he says, it isn't right that one man should hold what belongs to all Christians.
translation: 一个本地修士恳求你把家族圣物捐到教堂。毕竟独自占有属于所有基督徒的圣物是不对的。

original: I will donate it discreetly.
translation: 慎重起见，我会把它捐出去。

original: I will prepare a grand ceremony to hand it over.
translation: 先举行盛大的仪式，再把它交出去。

original: Who will rid me of this turbulent priest?
translation: 谁来为我除掉这个叫嚣不停的司祭？

original: You no longer follow the Christian faith. What should be done with your family's Christian relic?
translation: 你不再信奉基督教，怎么处理家族的基督圣物？

original: Keep it on display as a trinket.
Sell it to the Christians.
Throw it to the dogs.
Christians in your Realm will be gravely insulted.
translation: 境内的基督徒将此视为严重侮辱。

original: That smooth and slightly malty taste, refreshing with just the right amount of bitter. Ah, these monks certainly know the art of brewing!
translation: 口感顺滑，略带麦芽的清香，特别是那点恰到好处的苦，让人回味。嗯，这帮修士深谙酿造艺术。

original: I must visit the monastery more often.
Thanks but no thanks.
Such a wonderful bouquet. The complex blend of flavors spreads over my tongue just as the warmth spreads in my belly. These monks certainly know how to make a fine wine!
translation: 酒香让人陶醉，多种滋味在我的舌尖跳跃，一阵温暖包裹了我的肠胃。嗯，这帮修士确实会酿好酒！

original: I must visit the monastery more often.
Thanks but no thanks.
Monks from a nearby monastery have arrived bringing healing herbs and offering to help treat your illness.
translation: 附近修道院的修士带来了草药，提出帮你治病。

original: Thank them and let them help you.
I think not - these herbs smell funny.
translation: 我想还是算了吧——这草药的气味太奇怪。

original: One day, passing by a monastery, you come upon a monk sitting and painting in a field. You observe his work and marvel at the composition, the colors and the fine brush strokes that bring the simple canvas to life. This monk is truly an artistic prodigy.
translation: 某天，你经过一家修道院时，注意到有个修士坐在地上画着什么。仔细观察之后，你惊异于他的作品，恰当的颜色搭配和非凡的笔触仿佛赋予了这块画布以生命。他简直就是个艺术天才。

original: I will buy this painting and exhibit it at my castle!
translation: 我要买下这幅画，在我的城堡里展示！

original: Very nice, now let's eat.
On a courtesy visit to the abbot of a local monastery, you observe a group of monks translating beautifully illustrated books into your language.
translation: 某次去拜访一座本地修道院的院长，你注意到一些僧侣在把一些有着精美插画的书籍翻译成本国语言。

original: I will buy a few books. Perhaps I'll even read them.
translation: 我要买些书，或许再读读它们。

original: Pretty pictures, but I have more important things to do.
translation: 画很好看，然而并没有什么卵用。

original: Monks from the nearby monastery have been stopping by to trade for supplies quite often lately. They usually linger to talk and exchange knowledge.
translation: 近来，附近修道院的僧侣们更频繁的来此地购买日常所需。通常他们会盘桓数日，交流所学。

original: I should seek their company more often.
translation: 我应该常有他们的陪伴。

original: How tedious, these men of God.

During the last year or so, your [From.GetSonDaughter] [From.GetFirstName] has been spending a lot of time with the members of a local monastic order. You have also noticed that [From.GetSheHe] spends many hours per week in pious prayer. Then one day, [From.GetSheHe] approaches you asking for your permission to dedicate [From.GetHerHis] life to Christ.
translation: 大概从去年开始，你的[From.GetSonDaughter][From.GetFirstName]便花大量时间参与一个本地修道会的活动。你也注意到[From.GetSheHe]每周都会花大量时间进行虔诚的祈祷。终于有一天，[From.GetSheHe]来找你，请求准许[From.GetHerHis]为基督奉献余生。

original: Very well, if it's what [From.GetSheHe] really wants.
Absolutely not!
[From.GetFirstName] is very happy
[From.GetFirstName] is very upset
As I woke up this morning my hands and feet were bleeding, and there is a sharp pain in my side. What is happening to me?
translation: 清晨醒来时，我发现自己双手和双脚都出血了，身体两侧感到剧痛。我怎么了？

original: It is the stigmata! I am blessed by God!
translation: 这是圣痕！我受主的庇佑！

original: This is disturbing. I had better go see a healer.
translation: 令人不安。我最好去看大夫。

original: Walking alone on the battlements late one night, you suddenly see a shining white shape appearing in the sky above you. It seems to be moving towards you, or maybe away. There's a strange sound in the air too, like a whispering... what is going on?
translation: 某天深夜，你独自一人在城垛间漫步，你突然发现天空中出现了一道耀眼的白影，它离你忽远忽近。而空气中也出现了奇怪的声音，仿佛在对你低语……到底是什么情况？

original: The Virgin has appeared to me - I have been blessed!
translation: 圣母玛利亚现身了——她赐福于我！

original: Strange how clouds and wind can play tricks on one's mind.
translation: 大惊小怪，不过是云影和风声造成的错觉。

original: My belly is growing, and no one can doubt that I am with child. But my husband and I have not been intimate for a long time, how can I explain this?
translation: 我的肚子渐渐大了，想必是怀孕了。但我和丈夫很久没有亲近了，我怎么向他解释？

original: I have been blessed like the Virgin Mary!
translation: 我如童贞玛利亚般充满圣宠！

original: No miracle. But maybe my husband will believe that it is.
translation: 没那么神奇，但我的丈夫也许会这么认为。

original: My wife is with child, though she and I have not laid together for a very long time. She claims she has been blessed by our Lord just like the Virgin Mary.
translation: 我妻子怀孕了，可我们已经好久没有亲热了。她坚持自己如童贞玛利亚般蒙受神恩。

original: I am blessed also, like Joseph!
translation: 我也被赐福了！如同约瑟。

original: I shall pretend that I believe this.
Now wait a minute...
You have been approached by an old priest who is offering you an exorcism. He claims he can free you of your demonic possession.
translation: 一个上年纪的教士找上门来，他声称自己会驱邪术——帮助你从恶魔附体中解脱。

original: The demons must come out, at any cost!
translation: 我愿花费任何代价驱赶恶魔。

original: No! We shall be together forever!
Maybe some time of rest and introspection would serve me better.
translation: 我更需要一段时间的静养和内省。

original: Owner Martial Skill
Sons of Abraham
Wicked Priest
The personality and habits of this priest are very inappropriate for [GetHerHis] position. And what's worse, [GetSheHe] has been unable to hide them from public view.
translation: 这个司祭的性格和品行与[GetHerHis]地位极不相称，更糟糕的是，[GetSheHe]竟无能掩饰这一点以至进入了公众视线。

original: Wicked Caliph
This Caliph's personality and habits are very inappropriate for his position. And what's worse, he has been unable to hide them from public view.
translation: 这个哈里发的性格和品行与地位极不相称，更糟糕的是，他竟无能掩饰这一点以至进入了公众视线。

original: Unworthy Priest
The personality and habits of this priest are very inappropriate for [GetHerHis] position. And what's worse, [GetSheHe] has been unable to hide them from public view.
