[From.Mother.GetFirstName]'s Baby

My little [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is not like other children. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] does not scream or cry or even get upset, but [From.GetSubjectPronoun] observes the world with keen interest. This morning, [From.GetSubjectPronoun] burst into bubbling laughter when a cook cut his hand badly and there was blood everywhere. Animals do not like [From.GetObjectPronoun] and [From.GetSubjectPronoun] makes a strange buzzing sound when near other children. Courtiers whisper 'demon spawn' and the servants have started to avert their eyes and make covert signs to ward off evil.
translation: 我的小[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]和其它孩子不同。[From.GetSubjectPronounCap]从不哭闹或烦躁不安，[From.GetSubjectPronoun]总是以强烈的兴趣观察世界。今天早晨，目睹一个厨子切到自己的手，顿时鲜血直流，[From.GetSubjectPronoun]竟大笑起来。一旦旁边有其它小孩，[From.GetObjectPronoun]老是发出一种奇怪的嗡嗡声，动物也不喜欢[From.GetSubjectPronoun]。廷臣们私底下议论这是「恶魔之子」，下人们更是直接挡住眼睛，并悄悄做驱邪的手势。

original: I must fast and pray to [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]...
My [From.GetFirstName] is no devil child!
Consult my [Root.GetLordSpiritualName]
I'll seek the advice of [This.GetTitledFirstName]

My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName] has sought me out regarding the worrisome behaviour of [From.GetPossPronoun] little child, [FromFrom.GetFirstName]. The entire court seems to believe that the child is possessed by dark forces...
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]泄露了[From.GetPossPronoun]孩子，[FromFrom.GetFirstName]令人不安的举止。看起来整个宫廷都认为这个孩子被邪恶力量附身了……

original: What nonsense! Tell [From.GetObjectPronoun] not to worry!
The child is clearly an abomination!
translation: 这个孩子显然让人厌恶！

original: Get [From.GetFirstName] to confess! Has she lain with demons and practised witchcraft?
translation: 让[From.GetFirstName]坦白！她究竟是与恶魔同床还是施展了巫术？

original: Accuse the mother of witchcraft and of lying with demons!
translation: 指控这个母亲施行巫术并和恶魔交媾！

original: My wise [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] has examined the child and assures me that little [From.GetFirstName] is normal and that all the talk of devil spawn is utter nonsense. [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] is clear on this.
translation: 我睿智的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName][FromFrom.GetFirstName]检查了孩子并向我确认，小[From.GetFirstName]是正常的，那些恶魔之子的传闻完全是胡说八道。[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]最清楚这点。

original: What a relief!

My [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] believes that little [From.GetFirstName] is the spawn of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]! Even worse, [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun] is trying to get me to confess to witchcraft and to frolicking with demons!
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName][FromFrom.GetFirstName]确信小[From.GetFirstName]是[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]的子嗣！更糟糕的是，[FromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun]试图要我承认施行巫师，并和恶魔寻欢！

original: I have not lain with [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]!
Could it be? I've have had horrible nightmares...
translation: 怎么会这样？我的梦魇才开始……

original: [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap] must not live to spread these lies...
translation: 绝不能让[FromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap]继续活着散布谣言……

original: Tell [This.GetFirstName] about my vivid and impure dreams
translation: 把这些逼真而肮脏的梦境告诉[This.GetFirstName]

original: My [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] believes that little [From.GetFirstName] is the spawn of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]! Even worse, [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun] believes that [From.GetPossPronoun] mother, [From.Mother.GetTitledFirstName], is a witch who has had congress with demons!
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName][FromFrom.GetFirstName]确信小[From.GetFirstName]是[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]的产物！更糟糕的是，[FromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun]认为[From.GetPossPronoun]母亲，[From.Mother.GetTitledFirstName]是一个与恶魔交媾的女巫！

original: Ridiculous! I know this is not true.
translation: 太荒谬了！这分明是假的。

original: [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] avert! Seize both witch and child!
translation: [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap]保佑！把女巫和小孩都抓起来！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] assures me of her innocence, and I doubt she is lying...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]极力保证自身的清白，我怀疑她在说谎……

original: I will keep a close watch on them both
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has tearfully confessed to having lurid dreams at night, sometimes featuring a minotaur and other fantastic creatures!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]声泪俱下地告解道，最近常做恶梦，见到诸如米诺陶诺斯或其他荒诞不经的怪物！

original: A witch!
Well, who doesn't have lurid dreams?
translation: 算了，谁不会做点噩梦呢。

original: Publicly accuse [This.GetTitledFirstName] of unholy congress. Demand her abdication and that the child be declared illegitimate!
translation: 公开指控[This.GetTitledFirstName]与恶魔交媾。要求她必须马上退位，并宣布这个孩子是私生子！

original: Calm her down and help quell these rumors.

My wise [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] assures me that everyone suffers from wicked dreams from time to time, and though little [From.GetFirstName] is an odd child, there is likely nothing to worry about.
translation: 我睿智的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName][FromFrom.GetFirstName]告诉我，人们时常会受噩梦的困扰，这点毋庸置疑，再加上小[From.GetFirstName]本来就有点古怪，没有更多可担心的。

original: My traitorous [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] has publicly accused me of being a witch and claims that my little [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is the spawn of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]! A growing number of notables are demanding my abdication and that [From.GetFirstName] be declared illegitimate.
translation: 叛徒[Root.GetLordSpiritualName][FromFrom.GetFirstName]公开指控我是女巫，声称我的小[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]是[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]的产物！不断有达官显贵要求我退位并宣布[From.GetFirstName]是私生子。

original: Abdicate
Never! Guards, arrest [FromFrom.GetFirstName]!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has assured me of [FromFrom.Mother.GetFirstName]'s innocence, and I doubt either of them are lying...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]向我保证[FromFrom.Mother.GetFirstName]的清白，我怀疑他们都在说谎……

original: I will keep a close eye on the child, [FromFrom.GetFirstName].
translation: 我会密切监视这个孩子，[FromFrom.GetFirstName]。

original: My true Father spoke to me in a dream, revealing His plans for me. The world shall bow to my strength and the people will accept the truth of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] into their hearts... or DIE!
translation: 我真正的父神在梦中现身，向我宣示了他的旨意。世界将屈服于我的脚下，而凡人将诚心接纳[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]为唯一真神……否则他们就是死路一条！

original: The POWER!
Spawn of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]?

My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has always been a strange one, worrying friends and relatives - as well as members of the clergy - with [From.GetPossPronoun] acts of wanton cruelty, not to mention the creepy buzzing noises [From.GetSubjectPronoun] makes, the birds falling dead from the sky and all the little accidents happening around [From.GetObjectPronoun]. Despite all the best efforts at education and firm tutoring, our hopes have been dashed. A child no more, [From.GetSubjectPronoun] has turned into a truly frightening young [From.GetManWoman]...
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]从小就是个奇怪的孩子，[From.GetPossPronoun]荒唐而残忍的表现让亲朋好友——其中不乏教会修士——忧心忡忡，更不要提[From.GetSubjectPronoun]令人毛骨悚然的怪叫，飞鸟突然从天空坠落死亡，各种意外都能在[From.GetObjectPronoun]身边发生。在各种严加管教的努力失败后，我们彻底失望了。他也不再是个孩子，[From.GetSubjectPronoun]成长为一个让人恐惧的年轻[From.GetManWoman]……

original: Demon!
My sweet [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] looks so peaceful there in [From.GetPossPronoun] bed... Now [From.GetSubjectPronoun] must rest forever.
translation: 我的心肝[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]在[From.GetPossPronoun]小床上看起来如此的安静……现在[From.GetSubjectPronoun]必须永远安息。

original: Ave Satana!
Stab the long needle up the side of [This.GetPossPronoun] eye.
translation: 将长长的针从[This.GetPossPronoun]眼睛的上方刺下去。

original: Aaack! I wake to an excruciating PAIN in my eye! The devil child, [From.GetFirstName], is sitting on my chest, poking me in the ... blszzpt...
translation: 嗷噢！我被眼部的剧痛唤醒！这个邪恶的孩子，[From.GetFirstName]，正坐在我胸前，戳我的…blszzpt …

original: [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap] shall not have my soul!
I wake up with a start. There is a pressure on my chest! As I scream for help, a small shape scampers off, hissing loudly, hurling a long needle at me!
translation: 我突然醒来，觉得胸口好闷，像压了一块大石头！我正要呼救，只见一个小孩的轮廓蹦蹦跳跳地跑开，嘴里嘶嘶作响，把一根长长的针向我扔过来！

original: The demon spawn, [From.GetFirstName], I know it!
Aaack! I wake to an excruciating PAIN in my eye! As I scream for help, a small shape scampers off, hissing loudly, hurling a long needle at me!
translation: 嗷噢！我被眼部的剧痛唤醒！我正要呼救，只见一个蹦蹦跳跳小孩的轮廓，嘴里嘶嘶作响，拿着一根长长的针向我扎过来！

original: My eye! I... why can't I think straight?
translation: 我的眼睛！我……我怎么无法思考？

original: Lethal Nightmares

My beloved [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is dead! [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] was found lifeless in [From.GetPossPronoun] bed, face frozen in a terrible grimace, with a trickle of blood running down [From.GetPossPronoun] cheek. The physicians can find nothing wrong with the body. It's as if [From.GetSubjectPronoun] had died of fright from a terrible nightmare. There are dark rumours about the so called 'demon child', my [GetFromFromRelation] [FromFrom.GetFirstName], again... As always when something terrible happens, [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun] does seem inordinately happy.
translation: 我心爱的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]死了！ [From.GetSubjectPronounCap]在[From.GetPossPronoun]床上被发现时已经了无生息，[From.GetPossPronoun]脸颊淌着血，面部狰狞，表情扭曲。医生检查了遗体却没有发现任何异常，似乎[From.GetSubjectPronoun]死于噩梦的惊吓。有种关于「恶魔之子」的可怕传闻，想到我的[GetFromFromRelation][FromFrom.GetFirstName]，一言难尽……每当身边有可怕的事情发生，[FromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun]就会异常地开心。

original: Could it really be murder?
Lethal Nightmares

My beloved [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] claims that some... thing tried to kill [From.GetObjectPronoun] last night. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] woke up with a small shape pressing down on [From.GetPossPronoun] chest. It ran off hissing, but left a nasty long needle behind. I think it was just a nightmare - the maids leave needles lying around everywhere. However, there are dark rumours about the so called 'demon child', my [GetFromFromRelation] [FromFrom.GetFirstName], again...
translation: 我心爱的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]声称昨晚有什么……东西试图杀死[From.GetObjectPronoun]。[From.GetSubjectPronounCap]醒来时发现有个朦胧的小小轮廓坐在[From.GetPossPronoun]胸前，又嘶嘶作响地跑了，留下了一根可怕的长针。我觉得这只是噩梦罢了——毕竟侍女们经常把针乱放。有种关于「恶魔之子」的可怕传闻，想到我的[GetFromFromRelation][FromFrom.GetFirstName]，一言难尽…

original: I am surrounded by nonsense
Lethal Nightmares

My dear [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] must have suffered a stroke in [From.GetPossPronoun] sleep last night. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] was found drooling in bed, one eye bloodshot, mumbling about a small monster that stabbed [From.GetObjectPronoun] in the eye before it ran off. There are dark rumours about the so called 'demon child', my [GetFromFromRelation] [FromFrom.GetFirstName], again... As always when something terrible happens, [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun] does seem inordinately happy.
translation: 我亲爱的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]昨晚在[From.GetPossPronoun]睡梦中受到了袭击。仆人发现[From.GetSubjectPronounCap]在床上流着口涎，一只眼睛充血红肿，嘴里含糊不清地说着，似乎一只小怪物刺伤了[From.GetObjectPronoun]眼睛，然后跑掉了。有种关于「恶魔之子」的可怕传闻，想到我的[GetFromFromRelation][FromFrom.GetFirstName]，一言难尽……每当身边有可怕的事情发生，[FromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun]就会异常地开心。

original: I can't believe it...
By the grace of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName], my limb has grown back!
translation: 感谢[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]的恩典，我的断肢竟然长回来了！

original: Ave Satana!
My eyesight has been restored by the power of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]!
Sanguinem Bibimus!
The seed of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] will not be denied. My manhood is restored!
translation: [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]的种子毋庸置疑。我重新恢复男人的雄风！

original: Elevate corpus Satanae!
The dark animus of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] courses through my veins. My mind is clear once more!
translation: [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]的邪力渗入了我的血液，我的头脑再度清晰起来！

original: Corpus edimus!
[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap] gifted me with this disease to strengthen my resolve... Now, my will is like a sharpened blade and I wish this blight gone from my body!
translation: [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]赐我疾病以磨砺我的决心……现在，我的意志坚定如出鞘利刃，请将恶疾从我身体祛除吧！

original: Ave Antichriste!
No bars can hold [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]'s own! The senses of my gaolers were blinded long enough for me to escape.
translation: 没有枷锁能困住[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]的子民！狱守会失去知觉直到我逃脱。

original: Hail [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]!

My prisoner, the depraved [From.GetTitledName], who is rumored to be the spawn of [From.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName], has somehow escaped my dungeons! The guards have no explanation - the cell was still locked, but empty.
translation: 我的囚犯，卑鄙的[From.GetTitledName]——有人说是[From.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]之子——居然从我的地牢里跑了！狱守们无法说清发生了什么事——监舍的锁好好的，可就是人不见了。

original: These are dark tidings...

A well equipped army of cultists, followers of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName], has arrived in [Root.Location.GetName] led by three powerful witches. They stand ready to serve me and our dread master in this important war.
translation: 一支全副武装的邪教军队，自称[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]的信徒，在三名强大的女巫带领下抵达了[Root.Location.GetName]。他们已准备好在这场决战中为我和我们恐怖的主人效力。

original: Hail [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]!

My [GetFromRelation], little [From.GetFirstName], has really taken to [From.GetPossPronoun] nanny - a remarkably talented young woman, learned as any [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]. It is strange though... I have no idea when this girl showed up or where she came from, exactly.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]，小[From.GetFirstName]，被送去了[From.GetPossPronoun]保姆那儿——一个天资聪颖的年轻姑娘，据说曾受训以成为[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]。蹊跷的是……我压根不知道她怎么来的，出生在哪里。

original: She really is most impressive
My new nanny is a gift from [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] - literally. She is remarkably talented, more learned than any [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle].
translation: 我的新保姆简直是[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]的恩赐——其实她就是。她天资聪颖，而且比任何[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]都更博学。

original: I will put her to good use
My talented courtier, the nanny [From.GetFirstName], has left court to follow her young charge.
translation: 我那个能干的廷臣，那个保姆[From.GetFirstName]，离开了我的宫廷去追求她多彩的人生。

original: That's dedication!
A Bad Omen

During a nice family outing by the river, everyone suddenly noticed the talented nanny [From.GetFirstName] standing on top of the old tower. Smiling and looking straight at my little [GetFromFromRelation], she cried out 'I love you [FromFrom.GetFirstName]!' and calmly took a step forward into empty air, falling to the ground with black clothes flapping like the wings of some huge crow. [FromFrom.GetFirstName] laughed delightedly at the loud thump, clapping [FromFrom.GetPossPronoun] hands as everyone else stared in utter shock and disbelief.
translation: 风和日丽的日子，全家人在河边惬意地踏青，大家突然发现那个能干的保姆[From.GetFirstName]正站在一座旧塔的塔顶。她直勾勾地盯着我的小[GetFromFromRelation]痴笑，只听她边高喊着「[FromFrom.GetFirstName]我爱你！」边从容的踏出塔的边沿，直直地坠向地面，身穿的黑衣极速摆动，看上去像只大乌鸦在拍打翅膀。落地的声音好大，所有人都完全震惊了，不敢相信自己的眼睛，只有[FromFrom.GetFirstName]拍着[FromFrom.GetPossPronoun]手，还笑得很开心。

original: Shocking!
A Good Omen

During a nice outing by the river, everyone suddenly noticed my talented nanny [From.GetFirstName] standing on top of the old tower. Smiling and looking straight at me, she cried out 'I love you [FromFrom.GetFirstName]!' and calmly took a step forward into empty air, falling to the ground with black clothes flapping like the wings of a demon. Everyone else stared in utter shock and disbelief, but I could only laugh and clap my hands in approval. [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap] be praised!
translation: 风和日丽的日子，全家人在河边惬意地踏青，大家突然发现[From.GetFirstName]的保姆正站在一座旧塔的塔顶。她直勾勾地盯着我痴笑，只听她边高喊着「[FromFrom.GetFirstName]我爱你！」边从容的踏出塔的边沿，直直的坠向地面，身穿的黑衣极速摆动，就像恶魔展开了双翅。所有人都完全震惊了，不敢相信自己的眼睛，我却拍手笑颜赞许。她取悦了[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]！

original: A worthy sacrifice!
The Cadaver Synod

You have received strange news from Rome. The former Pope, [From.GetTitledFirstName], did by his actions and lifestyle so defile the Holy See that the current authorities in Rome decided to put his corpse on trial!\nThe corpse of [From.GetTitledFirstName] was removed from its tomb and brought to the papal court for judgement. It was propped up on a throne, and a deacon was chosen to speak for it as its legal representative.\nPerhaps unsurprisingly, the accused was found guilty on all accounts and subjected to a punishment most dire. The corpse was stripped of its papal vestments, three fingers on the right hand (those used to give blessings) were cut off, and then it was interred in a graveyard normally reserved for foreigners of low status. The punishment still not being deemed severe enough, the corpse was then exhumed again, tied to weights and cast into the river Tiber.
translation: 你听到一则发生在罗马的荒唐闹剧。前教宗，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，因生活方式和其他行为严重玷污了圣座，现任当局决定对他的尸体进行审判！\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]的遗体被人从坟墓中掘出，押到教宗宫廷以待审判。尸体被架在宝座上，另选出一名执事作为其辩护人。\n不足为奇，所有的控罪都宣布成立，并应施以酷刑。教宗的法衣被剥下，右手（用以赐福的）三根手指被切掉，接着尸体被草葬在通常埋葬身份卑微的外乡人的公墓。尔后，他们似乎认为这样的定罪还远远不够，尸体再次被扒出来，绑上石头扔进了台伯河。

original: I am sure the judges have acted wisely.
translation: 我确信法官审慎行使了职责。

original: Widespread rumors say that [From.GetTitledFirstName] leads a most wicked lifestyle, quite unsuitable for any priest and even more so for one in his exalted position.
translation: 到处都谣传，[From.GetTitledFirstName]腐化的生活作风与普通司祭的身份都不相称，更别提他自己的尊贵地位。

original: We must pray for his eternal soul.
translation: 让我们祈祷他的灵魂不朽。

original: Widespread rumors say that [From.GetTitledFirstName] leads a most wicked lifestyle, quite unsuitable for the spiritual head of all true Muslims.
translation: 到处都谣传，[From.GetTitledFirstName]生活腐化，不配做所有真正穆斯林的精神领袖。

original: Like this, he will lose Allah's blessing.
translation: 像他这样，必然失去安拉的荣宠。

original: Widespread rumors say that [From.GetTitledFirstName] has a most worrying personality and lifestyle, quite unsuitable for any priest and even more so for one in his exalted position.
translation: 到处都谣传，[From.GetTitledFirstName]的品德和生活方式让人担忧，连个祭司身份都配不上，更别提他自己的尊贵地位。

original: The Gods will not be pleased.
Widespread rumors say that [From.GetTitledFirstName] has a most worrying personality and lifestyle, quite unsuitable for any priest and even more so for one in his exalted position.
translation: 到处都谣传，[From.GetTitledFirstName]的品德和生活方式让人担忧，连个萨满身份都配不上，更别提他自己的尊贵地位。

original: Tengri's wrath will be upon him.
Widespread rumors say that [From.GetTitledFirstName] leads a most immoral lifestyle, quite unsuitable for any priest and even more so for one in his exalted position.
translation: 到处都谣传，[From.GetTitledFirstName]腐化的生活作风与普通祭司的身份都不相称，更别提他自己的尊贵地位。

original: Judgement comes to all.
Widespread rumors say that [From.GetTitledFirstName] has a most worrying personality and lifestyle, quite unsuitable for any priest and even more so for one in his exalted position.
translation: 到处都谣传，[From.GetTitledFirstName]的品德和生活方式让人担忧，连个巫师身份都配不上，更别提他自己的尊贵地位。

original: Perhaps it is time to sacrifice him...
translation: 或许是献祭他的时候了……

original: There are things a Caliph should not do and should not be. But we are only human after all, and as long as people aren't aware of your vices and faults it's not a problem. However, it seems you've been slipping in discretion lately - gossip is starting to spread, and there are murmurings all over the Muslim world about your wicked habits.
translation: 一个哈里发应该知道自己该做什么，不该做什么，凡事要合乎自己的身份。但毕竟我们都是凡人，只要不被人们注意，恶习和差错都不是问题。可是，最近你似乎不再那么谨慎——流言在四处传播——整个穆斯林世界都在悄悄谈论你的下流癖好。

original: May [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] have mercy on me.

A Fylkir of the Norse faith is expected to uphold certain standards of morality and strength. But we are only human after all, and as long as people aren't aware of your vices and faults it's not a problem. However, it seems you've been slipping in discretion lately - gossip is starting to spread, and there are murmurings all over the Norse world about your unworthy traits and habits.
translation: 斯堪的纳维亚人敬奉古道，而他们的英雄王更被视作道德和力量的典范。但毕竟我们都是凡人，只要不被人们注意，恶习和差错都不是问题。可是，最近你似乎不再那么谨慎——流言在四处传播——整个北方都在悄悄谈论你卑劣品行和下流勾当。

original: May the Gods still judge me favorably.
A visitor

You have received a visitor, a monk from the famous great abbey at Cluny. He tells you that the monks there spend much of their days in devoted prayer, and that they always mention the names of the most pious Christians in those prayers.\n\nIf you would demonstrate your immense piety by donating a large sum of gold to Cluny Abbey, you would surely be among those present in the monks' prayers.
translation: 一名来自位于克吕尼的修道院的僧侣拜访了你。他告诉你僧侣们终日虔诚祷告，在与上帝的对话中，他们会反复提到那些最虔诚的基督徒。\n\n如果你能捐赠克吕尼的大教堂一大笔钱以展现你的无比虔诚，你肯定能跻身他们称颂的最虔诚的信徒。

original: They shall have my support!
I'm sure they'll manage anyway.
translation: 我相信他们可以自食其力。

original: An invitation

My [Root.GetLordLady], we have received an invitation to visit the great monastery at Cluny!\n\nIt could make for a most interesting journey. Cluny Abbey has grown to great prominence and power since it was given independence by the Duke of Burgundy in 910. Subject now only to the Pope and supported by extensive lands as well as generous donations, it is a great center of wealth and learning. The Abbey's church is the largest in Europe, not even the great cathedrals in Rome or Constantinople can match it.
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，我们收到了来自克吕尼的大教堂的邀请函。\n\n自公元910年勃艮第公爵赐予自主权，克吕尼修道院开始变得益发著名而举足轻重，它仅受教宗节制，下辖大量封地，又多贵族慷慨捐赠，今天已发展成为财富和学术中心。修道院的主教堂堪称欧洲最大，甚至连罗马和君士坦丁堡的那些大圣堂都无法比拟。

original: A wonderful opportunity!
Tell them I can't come.
Cluny Abbey

So this is the famous Cluny Abbey! The great church towers majestically over an extensive complex of buildings. The surrounding farmlands are rich and fertile, with peasants toiling to bring the fruits of the land into the coffers of the monastery. You can see many monks moving about and a also spot a nun or two. You can sense the atmosphere of learning, piety and power. This is a place that enjoys the direct support of kings and powerful nobles, not to mention the Pope.
translation: 这一定就是著名的克吕尼修道院了！结构精巧的建筑群落，主教堂宏伟的尖塔最让人惊叹。四周广阔的农地丰饶多产，农民们在辛苦劳作，采摘的蔬果送到储藏室。许多僧侣来回穿行，间或有一两个修女。你能闻到空气中有着学识、虔诚和权势的味道。这是一个有着诸王、权贵直接支持，甚至由教宗撑腰的地方。

original: I must study the magnificent architecture here!
translation: 我要研究这里的宏伟建筑样式！

original: May I see the library?
These monks obviously eat well...
I have come here to pray.
The abbot of a nearby monastery has asked that you make a donation towards the repairs of the monastery church. Surely, it wouldn't hurt to ensure that you are in the monks' prayers?
translation: 附近修道院的院长请求我捐赠一笔修理费用于教堂的修缮。不过僧侣们祷告时能提到我的名字，这样也不错吧？

original: God will know that I support the church.
Sorry, I can't spare the gold right now.
translation: 对不起，我实在拿不出来这些钱。

original: the Maid
d'Arc
Many of the lords in the realm will be angry with [Root.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 王国的许多领主大老爷都对[Root.GetTitledFirstName]很生气。

original: Many members of the realm's clergy will be angry with [Root.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 王国的许多教士都对[Root.GetTitledFirstName]很生气。

original: The entire realm is gripped by religious fervor and an unquestioning belief in the ruler's divine mandate.
translation: 全国都都笼罩在宗教狂热的气氛中，对君权神授深信不疑。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName], the Maid of [From.GetName]

My [Root.GetLordLady], there are strange tidings from the county of [From.GetName]. As our country suffers under the strain of war, a young woman has come forward and declared that the Lord has spoken to her and instructed her to deliver us from the enemies of our land. She wears armour, wields a sword and rides with the soldiers. Her name is [FromFrom.GetFullName] and she is said to be approaching your court at this very moment to offer her services to you as a leader in the war.\n\nSurely, it's an absurd notion that a young peasant woman should take the role of marshal or general of the [Root.GetTitle]'s armies?
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，有些来自[From.GetName]省的传闻。而今我国战事不顺，据说有位少女挺身而出，并宣称主授命于她拯救人民和国家于危难。她身披铠甲，手执利剑，挎马与士兵奋战杀敌。她名叫[FromFrom.GetFullName]，此时正赶来宫廷，要向您效忠，为您领军作战。\n\n简直是荒谬，彻底的妄想，一个农家女能当上元帅，作[Root.GetTitle]军队的将军？

original: Let us receive her and see what she can do for us.
translation: 暂且接受她，看看有什么能耐。

original: [FromFrom.GetFirstName] the Maid of [From.GetName] has arrived at the court of [Root.GetTitledName].
[From.GetFirstName] – the nobles react

My [Root.GetTitle], the lords of the Realm complain. They think it most unfitting and strange that a young maid of low birth is allowed such a prominent position when there are noble lords aplenty who are much more well prepared and competent to lead your armies. Some of them are asking if you are doing this deliberately to insult them.\n\nThere is also the issue of her claiming to be personally sent by God - it sounds rather heretical.
translation: 我的[Root.GetTitle]，王国的领主老爷们满腹怨言，他们认为让一个出身卑微的农家女出任高位，此事有失国格和体面，何况有那么多出身高贵，武艺高超的贵胄子弟可以领军为您效力。有人甚至认为您是故意如此，好借机羞辱他们。\n\n同时，她被天主亲自派遣的这一说辞也有点问题——这听起来近乎异端。

original: Let them moan. I am the [Root.GetTitle].
translation: 让他们抱怨去吧，我可是[Root.GetTitle]。

original: I agree, but this woman is popular among the common folk.
translation: 我同意，可是这个女人深受平民爱戴。

original: Very well, we shall put her on trial for heresy.
translation: 那么我们将把她交予异端审判。

original: [From.GetFirstName] and the [Root.GetTitle]

One evening at court, [From.GetFirstName] approaches you and asks to speak with you in private. You agree and the both of you sit down for a talk in your chambers. [From.GetFirstName] speaks to you of her visions of Christ and her quest to save the country from the enemy. She speaks with passion, her simple honesty and forceful zeal both coming across as she looks you in the eyes. She declares her fierce loyalty and love for you as the chosen [Root.GetTitle]. You are quite impressed by her passion, intelligence and sincerity.
translation: 夜晚，[From.GetFirstName]来到宫廷，请求和你单独会面。你召见了她，在你的房间相对而谈。[From.GetFirstName]向你描述了她对基督的神视和拯救国家于敌手的使命。她的双眼直视着你，目光传递着热切和真诚，而言语间又充满激情，表达了对你作为神选之[Root.GetTitle]的强烈忠诚与爱。她的热情、聪慧和真诚深深感动了你。

original: Thank you for coming to see me, [From.GetFirstName].
My dearest [From.GetFirstName], you are truly sent by [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
translation: 亲爱的[From.GetFirstName]，你确实是 [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]派来的救星！

original: We both know you are a powerhungry impostor, [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 你我都清楚，你只是个渴望权力的假货，[From.GetFirstName]。

original: Love, you say? Come sit over here...
translation: 我听到你说「爱」，是吗？过来，坐到这儿……

original: The Mission

[FromFrom.GetFirstName] looks at you seriously. 'I hope you have been listening, my [Root.GetLordLady]. The country is hurting and you, its rightful sovereign, is the one to mend it. I shall aid you, this is the mission I have been given by our Lord Christ.'
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]严肃的看着你，「我希望你仔细听，我的[Root.GetLordLady]。现在国家千创百孔，而你，它的合法统治者，必须重振山河。而我将为你赴汤蹈火，这是我主耶稣赋予我的使命。」

original: Very good.
Zeal

[FromFrom.GetFirstName] looks at you with tears of joyous fervour in her eyes. 'My [Root.GetLordLady], you are the highest and also the wisest [Root.GetManWoman] in the realm. God shall guide you through me, and the people shall be saved. With the sword of righteousness in my hand, guided by your wisdom and the will of God, we will be victorious!
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]饱含热泪地看着你，「我的[Root.GetLordLady]，你是王国至高无上而又睿智无匹的[Root.GetManWoman]。天主会籍由我身指引你，救民于水火之中。有你的智慧引领我手中正义长剑，我们定能凯旋！这是上帝的旨意！」

original: So it shall be!
Mistrust

[FromFrom.GetFirstName] stands up, a shocked and bewildered expression or her face. 'My [Root.GetLordLady], your accusation wounds me most deeply! I have heard evil things said of me, but did not think I would hear it from you. Still, my loyalty to you comes from Christ and He is stronger than the Devil who has corrupted your faith. I shall always remain your servant, my [Root.GetLordLady]'.\n\nWith these last words, [FromFrom.GetFirstName] kneels before you, tears of sorrow streaming down her face.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]站了起来，脸上露出震惊和疑惑的表情，「我的[Root.GetLordLady]，你的指控深深伤害了我！这些谣言中伤我听过无数次，可从没想过听你说出来是这么难以接受。陛下，受耶稣所命，我的忠诚仍属于您，天主比腐蚀您心智的恶魔更强大。我仍是您忠实的仆人，我的[Root.GetLordLady]。」\n\n说完这番话，[FromFrom.GetFirstName]跪在你的面前，任由悲伤的泪水在脸庞上流淌。

original: Stop this ridiculous charade, woman.
The Lovers

[FromFrom.GetFirstName] quietly sits down next to you and looks into your eyes. As you embrace her and kiss her, she shudders and whispers: 'My Lord, see how my hands tremble at your touch. Just as I felt this immense joy mixed with bewilderment when Christ first spoke to me, so do I now feel my blood rushing in the same way in your presence. It seems to me that it is the will of God that we shall be together.'
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]轻轻地坐到你身前，看着你的眼睛。当你拥她入怀，吻上双唇，她浑身颤栗、吹气如兰：「大人，当您抚摩时，可看见我双手是怎样的颤抖。当初聆听耶稣首次教诲，我也同现在这样感到无限的欢愉又带着莫大的困惑。我能感到你皮肤下的热血贲涌，我自己也一样。对我而言，和你在一起就像是神的旨意。」

original: Come to my bedchamber then, [FromFrom.GetFirstName].
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] the Chaste

[FromFrom.GetFirstName] recoils away from your advances, her eyes expressing surprise, sorrow and anger as she looks at you. 'My Lord, I did not think the devil would have sown such dark seeds in you as to try and impose on my chastity! I belong to Christ and to no man. Rest assured, my Lord - my loyalty to you is untouched, but so shall my body also remain, lest it be the touch of cold steel and martyrdom.'
translation: [FromFrom.GetFirstName]躲开了你的靠近，她看着你，眼光交织着惊诧、悲伤和愠怒，「大人，我不认为恶魔在您心里种下了如此罪恶的种子，您居然觊觎我的贞洁！我的身体已献给耶稣，不会属于任何凡人。大人，我的忠诚看不见摸不着——这点毫无疑问——而我的肉体也是如此，它的抚摸如刀剑，它的亲吻如酷刑。」

original: I see.
[From.GetFirstName] and the common folk

The entire country is boiling with rumours and gossip of [From.GetFullName], the humble country girl who rose to become a trusted servant of the [Root.GetTitle]. Hope of defeating the realm's enemies is blossoming, and peasants everywhere are celebrating this fantastic tale of a virgin saviour from the humblest ranks of society.
translation: 举国上下都在为有关[From.GetFullName]的传闻喋喋不休——这个一跃成为[Root.GetTitle]身边红人的谦逊农家女。随着抵御外侮的希望逐渐明朗，各地的农民争相传颂这个少女救星的传奇故事——尽管她出身社会最底层。

original: She is truly a legend in her own time!
translation: 在她所处的时代堪称传奇！

original: [From.GetFirstName] requests an audience

[From.GetFirstName] has come before you asking to speak to you at the council. She says that the military establishment seems trapped in old doctrines and that the commanders would benefit from more offensive thinking, as well as more religious schooling, of course.\n\nThere is grumbling from some of the assembled nobles at her speech.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]来到你面前，请求在军事会议上发言。她说我军的部署似乎过于古板教条，现任指挥官显然欠缺积极的战略思维和正规的军事教育，后者尤其明显。\n\n话音刚落，一些爵士忍不住破口大骂。

original: Thank you, [From.GetFirstName], that's a good idea.
When I need your advice, I'll ask for it.
translation: 当我需要你的建议时，我自会请教你。

original: I've had enough of this insolence – arrest her!
translation: 我受够了这种傲慢，逮捕她！

original: [From.GetFirstName] and the Church

Your [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetFullName] approaches you one morning for a candid conversation: 'My [Root.GetLordLady], there is much displeasure among the clergy at the elevation of this young woman, [From.GetFirstName]. The things she says are considered heretical by some in the Holy Church, and others, frankly, see their positions threatened by one of such low birth and meager schooling gaining so much prestige. I would advise you to consider whether it is worth protecting this young lass at so great a potential cost.'
translation: 一天早晨，你的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName][Root.job_spiritual.GetFullName]单独觐见你，他坦率地说道：「我的[Root.GetLordLady]，教会对这个名叫[From.GetFirstName]的女人的擢升非常不满。教会中有些人认为她的言行近乎异端，而剩下的人，老实说，他们觉得自己的地位受到威胁——被这个出身卑微、缺乏教养却声名显赫的农家女。我请您郑重考虑，为保护这个小姑娘——冒着可能遭受巨大损失的风险——是否值得。」

original: Please remind these clergymen who is [Root.GetTitle].
translation: 给我提醒这些牛鼻子到底谁是[Root.GetTitle]！

original: She is merely a tool, the Church has nothing to fear.
translation: 我只不过在利用她，教会不用担心。

original: Very well, we will put her on trial and see if she is a heretic.
translation: 那好吧，把她送上宗教裁判庭，看她是否是异端。

original: The influence of [From.GetFirstName]

These are unusual times. [From.GetFirstName]'s influence is felt all around, wherever you go. There is a surge in religiosity among the commoners, who see her as a national saviour and almost a Christ-figure. Among the nobles many are charmed by her pious innocence and energetic zeal, in spite of most of them also viewing her as a dangerous upstart. Meanwhile, the clergy is divided, some seeing a heretic and others a saint.
translation: 最近很不寻常，无论你走到哪里，[From.GetFirstName]的影响力似乎无处不在。平民狂热地崇拜她，他们视她为救世主——甚至神的化身。尽管大部分贵族把她视作威胁，但他们好多人打心里敬重她异乎寻常的虔诚和热切的真诚。同时，教会也分裂成两派，一些人说她是异端，另外的把她视作圣人。

original: We should all try to be more like her.
I dislike fanatics, but I will suffer her for now.
translation: 我讨厌狂信者，不过再忍忍她吧。

original: A common girl from [From.GetName]

Your [Root.GetChancellorName] [Root.job_chancellor.GetFullName] comes to see you, a look of worry on [Root.job_chancellor.GetHerHis] face. [Root.job_chancellor.GetSheHe] explains that there are increased grumblings among the nobles regarding the position of your protegé [FromFrom.GetFirstName]. Many of them refuse to accept that a lowborn woman from [From.GetName], however competent and pious, be continuously given so many privileges normally reserved for nobility. It sets a bad example for the peasants and may cause unrest, they fear. There have also been numerous incidents of perceived insults and scandals of protocol between [FromFrom.GetFirstName] and various prestigious army commanders.\n\nIt seems many nobles feel they have suffered her too long, and some still entertain the idea of demanding her arrest and trial for heresy.
translation: 你的[Root.GetChancellorName][Root.job_chancellor.GetFullName]觐见，[Root.job_chancellor.GetHerHis]看上去上面带忧虑。[Root.job_chancellor.GetSheHe]告诉你贵族们对你的宠儿[FromFrom.GetFirstName]身居高位的不满在与日俱增。大多数人都不认可这个来自[From.GetName]的卑微农家女，不管多么能力出众，她都不配受赐这么多只有贵族才配拥有的权利。贵族们认为这让那些乡巴佬以为自己也可以争取到这些权利，肯定会导致动乱。许多有名望的将军们也认为[FromFrom.GetFirstName]在军队的存在是对他们的羞辱。\n\n很多贵族甚至对她已忍无可忍，策划逮捕她并送往宗教裁判庭。

original: Bah! Their own incompetence makes them envious.
translation: 呸！他们除了嫉妒，就剩无能！

original: I shall force her to speak more humbly henceforth.
translation: 我必须提醒她谨言慎行。

original: Not noble enough? Bring her before me and I shall knight her!
translation: 不够高贵是吧？把她召来，我要册封她为骑士！

original: I cannot abide this any longer. Put her in chains!
translation: 是可忍孰不可忍，逮捕她！

original: [From.GetFirstName] marries

Never has the realm seen so much attention focused on the wedding of one who is not of noble birth. The wedding of [From.GetFirstName] has caused ringing of churchbells and impromptu feasts and prayers among the common folk all around the country.\n\nNo longer a maid perhaps, but an icon of the realm still, and even the [Root.GetTitle] should make sure to make a public toast to the newly-weds.
translation: 王国从来没有如此关注过一场婚礼——尤其是主角并非出自名门。全国的教堂都为为[From.GetFirstName]的婚礼鸣钟，平民自发为其祷告并欢宴庆祝。\n\n她不再保持圣女身份，但依旧是国民偶像，连[Root.GetTitle]都表示要为新人公开祝酒。

original: Indeed!
[From.GetFirstName] the mother

[From.GetFirstName] the Maid she used to be, but no longer. Some of her followers speak of a virgin birth, though such talk is frowned upon by the Church. The image of [From.GetFirstName] has now changed in the eyes of many, but she continues to be a focus of adulation, and very soon after the birth she has once again taken up her sword and saddled her horse.
translation: 圣女[From.GetFirstName]已成为历史。她的忠实拥趸称之为感神而孕的说法让教会嗤之以鼻。如今大多数人对[From.GetFirstName]的看法已有所改变，但她仍集万千崇敬于一身。生产后不久，校场再现她横刀立马的英姿。

original: So strong!
The trial of [From.GetFirstName]

[From.GetFirstName] has been put on trial for heresy. She claims to be sent by Christ, to be his messenger. She is accused of being sent by the devil, and of claiming to be God's daughter, and of sinning by wearing men's attire, among other things. The judges come mostly from the clergy, and they begin a hard line of questioning against the young woman. There is unrest outside the castle where the trial is held, as many followers have come to pray for her and express their belief in her innocence. This trial seems set to last for a while.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]被送上宗教裁判庭，她坚称自己是耶稣亲派的信使。她被指控的罪状有：被恶魔驱使、僭称神女、擅着男装等等。绝大多数法官由教会人员出任，他们对这个年轻女子严刑逼供。举行审判的城堡外发生了骚乱，各地的追随者云集于此，为她祈祷，坚称她无罪。看来这次审判注定难以消停。

original: The truth shall be our only concern.
The trial of [From.GetFirstName] – judgement

[From.GetFirstName] has been put through long sessions of questioning for over a month now. After much deliberation on the law and theology and evaluation of testimony the case still seems unclear to many. It all seems to come down to whether you want to believe that she is a messenger of God or of the Devil. Or perhaps it's more down to whether it is politically expedient to convict her or not. Young [From.GetFirstName] herself has assumed a position of sorrowful fatalism. She says she has seen her fate in a vision and that she knows what is to come.\nThe crowds surrounding the trial all await the verdict with tension. If [From.GetFirstName] were to be aquitted, the humiliation of the trial itself surely signifies that she has fallen from royal grace and will never come back to hold the position she once did. But in the case of a conviction, a gruesome death by burning at the stake is certain to be the fate that awaits her. There is little mercy for heretics.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]一案经过数次开庭审理，现在算起来快有一个月了。虽经过律法细节和神学方面的仔细推敲和庭审证据的反复考量，这一案的走向仍不甚明了，这根本上取决于你的判断——她是天主还是魔鬼的信使，或者说对她定罪是否符合你的政治利益。年轻的[From.GetFirstName]扮演了一个悲剧角色。她说自己早已预见到今天的命运，知道接下来会发生什么。\n法庭外聚集的人群紧张地等待着最终的裁定。即便[From.GetFirstName]被宣判无罪，这场羞辱性的审判本身便意味着她已失去皇家荣宠，绝不可能再恢复到以前的地位。而一旦被定罪，毫无疑问——被绑在柱子上活活烧死，将是她的宿命。异端的处置从无怜悯。

original: She is guilty.
She is innocent.
The execution of [From.GetFirstName]

The flames leap higher and higher, crackling as they begin to eat at the wood. Slowly, [From.GetFirstName] starts to twist as they begin to lick her legs. The gathered crowd stares in stunned silence - some hungry for her death, others overcome by horror at what they see. The life of this woman is coming to an end, she who captured the attention of the entire realm during these months. Saint or devil – the eyes of the onlookers hold different views, but it seems certain that she will remembered for many many years. Perhaps she shall have her restitution in time, perhaps not.\nAs the flames climb higher and take hold of [From.GetFirstName]'s body, she twitches violently but still does not cry out. Her gaze is fixed on the heavens, tears streaming from her face. Many onlookers turn away now, but others are fixed to the spot, unable to avert their eyes. Slowly, [From.GetFirstName] disappears from view as the flames rise around her.
translation: 火舌越蹿越高，它噼啪作响，开始撕咬柱子的底部。渐渐的，当火苗舔过双腿，[From.GetFirstName]的身体变得扭曲。周围的人群一言不发地盯着看——一些人迫不及待她的死亡，其他人则因眼前所见而感到恐惧。这个女孩快断气了，虽然她几个月以来都是万众瞩目的焦点。圣人还是恶棍？看法因人而异，毋庸置疑的是她将青史留名。随时光流逝，以后她能平冤昭雪也说不定，谁知道。\n火苗飘得更高，[From.GetFirstName]的全身已被火焰吞噬，她开始剧烈抽搐却依然一声不吭。她凝望天空，泪流满面。许多人心中不忍，或转身，或遮面，也有人目不转睛的死死盯着。火越来越大，[From.GetFirstName]的身形渐渐消失在烈火中。

original: May the Lord have mercy on her soul.
[From.GetFirstName] is aquitted

The aquittal of [From.GetFirstName] have left mixed reactions across the realm. There are celebrations among the peasants, and more mixed reactions among the nobility and clergy. [From.GetFirstName] herself spends these days in prayer. She realizes that she will not lead armies again nor enjoy the ear of the [Root.GetTitle] as before. Still, the aquittal at the trial has vindicated her words and actions and she seems at peace. No longer on the grand stage of war and politics, she seems now content to spend the rest of her days living as a nun.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]的无罪释放导致王国上下不同的反应。农民们一致开始庆祝，贵族阶层和教士们的分歧则大得多。审判期间，[From.GetFirstName]一直在祷告，她知道自己不能像以前那样领军打仗，或者再领受[Root.GetTitle]的荣宠。好在，宣判无罪——这件事更证明了她所言非虚，行事光明磊落。而且，她享受现在的宁静，远离战场厮杀和宫廷险恶，不如遁入空门了却余生吧。

original: You are safe now, [From.GetFirstName].
Years later...

After the first turbulent years, it seems everyone in the country has gotten used to [FromFrom.GetFullName]. Some appreciate her and some do not, but the more violent controversy and commotion has died out and people are now preoccupied with other matters. She lives on, although the tales of the early years of the Maid of [From.GetName] are already the stuff of legend.
translation: 经年累月，似乎举国上下都对[FromFrom.GetFullName]的存在习以为常。有人感激涕零，有人不以为意，但不再有激烈的争论或大打出手了，人们的注意力逐渐被其他琐事占据。她仍静静的活着，而少女[From.GetName]的故事已成为一代传奇。

original: With time, anything and everything becomes normal.
translation: 时间让世间万物变得苍白。

original: [This.GetFirstName] will be regarded as your [This.GetSonDaughter] and can be legitimized later
translation: [This.GetFirstName]被视作你的[This.GetSonDaughter]，日后可以让其归嗣

original: The Kohen Gadol

There has not been a Kohen Gadol – a High Priest of Judaism – since the Romans destroyed the Second Temple roughly a thousand years ago. At long last, this position has been filled and the High Priesthood reconstituted.\n\nLike the Jewish priests of ancient times, the Kohen Gadol was traditionally required to be a descendant of Aaron, the older brother of Moses. Due to a lack of suitable candidates this requirement has been waived, but the new High Priest still enjoys the respect of the Jewish religious communities, and the Priesthood has moved into and established itself at the Third Temple.
translation: 自从一千年前罗马人凶暴地焚毁第二神殿后，首席大祭司这一犹太教高阶祭司职务便不复存在。多年以后，这个高阶神职又得以恢复并行使其职。\n\n因循古道，首席大祭司按惯例必须由摩西之兄——亚伦的子孙担任。由于合适的候选者不足，这一规定被废处，新任的首席祭司长仍深受犹太族群的尊敬，现已将居所定在第三神殿。

original: Long live the Kohen Gadol!
This flank leader has managed to find a favourable spot to fight the battle at making the flank §Ynarrow§W and the full force of the enemy can't charge at them.
translation: 这位侧翼指挥官设法找到有利地形、使得战斗阵线得以§Y缩短§!，从而使本军阵部队免受敌军的全力冲锋。

original: Because this flank has a choke-point, only $MAX_TROOPS$ can fight at the same time on each side.
translation: 由于我军侧翼薄弱，除非有 $MAX_TROOPS$，否则将腹面受敌。

original: You will not be forgotten
Abandoned Plot

The titles of the ruler are divided among his children, with the oldest getting the primary title. If the ruler has no children who can inherit, the law defaults to Primogeniture. You get no Prestige penalty for having unlanded sons, and can have a §Y30%§! larger demesne. Gavelkind is a very popular law with everyone except the oldest child. Destruction of titles while under Gavelkind succession is not allowed.
translation: 领主的头衔将分配及众子，主头衔则由长子继承。如果领主没有能继承家业的子女，则会循长子继承法传承。采取本法时，众子即使没有土地，也不会影响你的威望，而且你的直辖领地上限能够多 §Y30%§!。均分继承法广受认同，只有长子会感到不快。均分继承法之下，你不能销毁头衔。

original: Select Vassal to Transfer
Since §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! is so insignificant, no one will care.
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!是如此的微不足道，没有人会在乎。

original: Duchy Capital
Kingdom Capital
Empire Capital

§GActive§!

DLC
MOD

Cannot select a leader for a flank which consists of only mercenaries and holy order companies.
translation: 无法为只有雇佣军和骑士团的侧翼选择指挥者。

original: Autosave to Cloud
Local
Cloud
Split off Special Troops
Split off Mercenaries
Split off Holy Orders
Split off Retinues
Split off Event Spawned
All vassals' opinion of §Y$ACTIVE$§! changes by $MUCH$
translation: 所有封臣对§Y$ACTIVE$§!的好感都改变了$MUCH$

original: Ironman
Select a random playable character
When playing in Ironman mode, you cannot manually save the game. You can only get Steam Achievements in Ironman mode.
translation: 铁人模式中，你不能手动保存游戏。你只能在铁人模式中获得 Steam 成就。

original: King
Queen
Cannot start a Ironman game when the game is modified.
translation: 游戏如被修改将则无法进行铁人模式。

original: Ironman Mode: §GEnabled§!
Ironman Mode: §RDisabled§!
You cannot change character right now.
Error writing save game
translation: 保存游戏时发生写入错误

original:
Failed to save game for unknown reason.

Are you using forbidden characters in the file name?
Do you have enough free space?
translation:
未知原因导致存档失败。

是否存在非法字符？
你的硬盘空间是否充足？

original: Unsynchronize file
This will remove the save game from cloud storage. The file will not be deleted local.
translation: 将从云端删除存档。本地存档不受影响。

original: Start Ironman

§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! takes all occupied territory.\n§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! takes or vassalizes all titles in the §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§! belonging to §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!得到所有占领的领土。\n§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!取得或附庸所有§Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§!属于§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!法理的头衔。\n

original: By submitting this item, you agree to the terms of service of Steam Workshop.
translation: 即将提交资料，这代表您同意创意工坊的所有服务条款。

original: Target controls more cardinals than you.
translation: 对方掌握的枢机比你多。

original: has a bad reputation
Your vassal was appointed Cardinal.
translation: 你的封臣被任命为枢机。

original: Your vassal $NEWHOLDER$ was given a seat in the College of Cardinals.
translation: 你的封臣$NEWHOLDER$被任命为枢机团的一员。

original: Your vassal $NEWHOLDER$ was given a seat in the College of Cardinals.
translation: 你的封臣$NEWHOLDER$得以跻身枢机团。

original: The Shepherds' Crusade
§Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§! is NOT involved in an §Yongoing war§!
The Cardinal View

In this screen you can see the college of cardinals.These are the ones responsible for electing a new pope among themselves when the old one dies. It also shows who is likely to be given title of cardinal if a spot opens up.
translation: 在这个界面，您可以看到枢机团。如果教宗去世，这些人中将经由自身选举产生新教宗。如果席位存在空缺，它也将显示谁可能成为枢机。

original: Every catholic bishop in the world can be given a seat in the College of Cardinals. Every bishop have a score which the Pope uses to decide who gets the open spot. This score is calculated from a wide range of factors but you can also directly influence it by promising money to the Pope. This will make it much more likely that he will choose a bishop from your realm.
translation: 世界上每一个天主教主教都可以成为枢机。每一个主教有一个得分，教宗由此决定谁将成为枢机。这个分数是由多种因素计算出，但你也可以通过许诺钱给教宗来影响它。这将使教宗更倾向于你领地内的主教。

original: Each cardinal has a single vote he can cast for who he wants to become the next Holy Father of the Catholic Church. The one with the most support is known as the Preferatus and is most likely to become the new Pope.
translation: 每个枢机都有一票，他可以投票选举公教会的下任圣父教宗。支持者最多的被称为预选者，是最有可能成为新教宗的候选者。

original: The massacre at [From.GetName]

My [Root.GetLordLady], the heretic city of [From.GetName] has surrendered to us. We could punish the heretics by sacking the place, but it has been put forth by some that the city's populace are of mixed faith and it is unlikely that the soldiers will know who is a heretic and who is not.
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，异教的[From.GetName]已向我军投降。我们可以洗劫城市以示对异教徒的惩罚，但有人提出城内居民信仰混杂，士兵不可能分清谁是异教徒。

original: Kill them all! God will know his own.
translation: 杀光他们！神能认出他的子民。

original: We must show restraint. Hold off the soldiers.
translation: 我们要保持克制，下令约束士兵。

original: The Shepherds' Crusade

A combination of economic stress and religious fervor caused by the current crusade has led to considerable unrest among the peasants. A strange elderly monk known calling himself The Master of Hungary has been criticizing the religious establishment and preaching a 'Shepherds' Crusade' to the common folk. He has already been able to gather a huge following, an army of shepherds as it were, and they have been assaulting priests and killing Jews all over the country. Needless to say, the church is not amused. There is now talk among this rabble of marching on the capital to seek the support of the [Root.GetTitle] - who knows where this will end?
translation: 十字军远征引起的经济压力和宗教狂热导致了下层社会的动荡。一个自称匈牙利之主的老修士抨击当下的宗教体系，号召平民发动「牧羊人十字军」。一时间一呼百应，应者云集，俨然组成一支牧羊人「大军」，在乡间四处攻击教士，残杀犹太人。不用说，教会大为震怒。据称这帮乌合之众正赶往首都以寻求[Root.GetTitle]的支持——谁知道这场闹剧会怎么收场？

original: We will appease them with gold.
We should try to recruit them for our cause.
These criminals must hang.

The Shepherds' Crusade has been plaguing the country for many months now, causing much terror and woe. Lately, however, it seems to have been slowly losing its initial strength and zeal. According to some reports now, the whole movement is dissolving as people are returning to their homes and abandoning the whole adventure.
translation: 牧羊人十字军的祸患已持续十数月，给民众带来无尽的恐惧和灾难。然而，他们似乎开始逐渐丧失原本的狂热势头——据说好多人放弃冒险准备回家——这导致了整场运动的式微。

original: Praise [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
[From.GetTitledName] has been seized and killed by members of the Shepherds' Crusade!
translation: [From.GetTitledName]被牧羊人十字军俘虏后惨遭杀害。

original: Oh no!
It seems that my interest in Christendom has come to the attention of one of its practitioners within the realm. We met and have had the most fruitful discussions about theology and other matters.
translation: 似乎我对基督教的兴趣引起了某个教士的注意。我们会面后进行了有益的谈话并讨论了神学以及其它问题。

original: I have made a friend!
It seems that my interest in Islam has come to the attention of one of its practitioners within the realm. We met and have had the most fruitful discussions about theology and other matters.
translation: 似乎我对伊斯兰教的兴趣引起了某个修士的注意。我们会面后进行了有益的谈话并讨论了神学以及其它问题。

original: I have made a friend!
It seems that my interest in Paganism has come to the attention of one of its practitioners within the realm. We met and have had the most fruitful discussions about theology and other matters.
translation: 似乎我对多神教的兴趣引起了某个修士的注意。我们会面后进行了有益的谈话并讨论了神学以及其它问题。

original: I have made a friend!
It seems that my interest in Zoroastrianism has come to the attention of one of its practitioners within the realm. We met and have had the most fruitful discussions about theology and other matters.
translation: 似乎我对祆教的兴趣引起了某个修士的注意。我们会面后进行了有益的谈话并讨论了神学以及其它问题。

original: I have made a friend!
It seems that my interest in Judaism has come to the attention of one of its practitioners within the realm. We met and have had the most fruitful discussions about theology and other matters.
translation: 似乎我对犹太教的兴趣引起了某个修士的注意。我们会面后进行了有益的谈话并讨论了神学以及其它问题。

original: I have made a friend!
How I hate the infidels! Smash them, kill the scum, kick them in the teeth, wipe them off the face of the earth! Bastard infidels, aaah how I hate them, I hate them!
translation: 我对异教徒恨之入骨！粉碎他们，杀光这些渣滓，拔光他们的牙齿，让这些杂碎从世上消失！浑蛋异教徒，嗷噢噢，我恨死他们了！我恨死他们！

original: Oh, did I say that out loud?
My new faith gives me strength, but I will not forget where I came from or disrespect those who still follow the old ways.
translation: 新的信仰给了我力量，但我不会忘本，也不会轻视坚持原信仰的人。

original: They will see the truth eventually.
My new faith infuses me with strength. But it vexes me that there are still those who do not follow the way of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName].
translation: 新的信仰让我充满力量。那些仍不肯接受[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的人让我生气。

original: Infidels!

We Muslims believe in God, and in that which has been bestowed from on high upon us and upon Abraham and Ishmael and Isaac and Jacob and their descendants, and that which has been vouchsafed to Moses and Jesus and all the prophets by their Sustainer - we make no distinction between any of them, and it is unto Him that we surrender ourselves.
translation: 我们信我们所受的启示，与易卜拉欣、易司马仪、易司哈格、叶尔孤白和各支派所受的启示，与穆萨和尔撒受赐的经典，与众先知受主所赐的经典；我们对他们中任何一个，都不加以歧视，我们只顺真主。

original: We must not condemn the Jews and Christians for their errors.
translation: 我们不能因身为犹太人或基督徒而定罪。

original: the Master of Hungary
Infidels in your realm are insulted.
translation: 国内的异教徒受到羞辱。

original: A visitor

You have received a visitor, a monk from one of the monasteries on the fabled Mount Athos on the Chalkidiki peninsula in Greece. He tells you that the monks are constantly expanding their presence and constructing new monasteries at this most holy site. However, building for the glory of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] requires earthly funds, he explains, and this is why he has come to see you.\n\nIf you would demonstrate your piety by donating a large sum of gold to the monasteries on Mount Athos, it would surely become known all over the land that you have done so, and you would of course also be mentioned in the monks' daily prayers.
translation: 一名僧侣拜访了你，他来自闻名遐迩的阿索斯山的某座修道院——此地位于希腊的哈尔基季基半岛。他告诉你，当地僧侣们开始四处活动，准备在这个最神圣的地方修建更多修道院。可是，为[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的荣光修造需要巨量的资金，而这就是他此行的目的。\n\n如果你能捐赠阿索斯山的修道院一大笔钱以展现你的无比虔诚，此事必将传遍整个圣地，我保证僧侣们终日的虔诚祈祷中，一定会提及你的名字。

original: Of course they shall have my support!
I can't spare the funds right now.
translation: 我现在拿不出这么多钱。

original: An invitation

My Lord, we have received an invitation to visit the holy monasteries on Mount Athos! The monks there are very protective of their domain, and it such an invitation is surely testament to your exalted status among men.\n\nIt is said that Mount Athos' status as a holy place began when it was first visited by the Virgin Mary, who loved it so that she asked her Son to make it her personal garden. And so it was, the mountain and the peninsula were consecrated as the Garden of the Mother of God. Because of this, all other women are forbidden to tread on its sacred ground. Monks, however, have been living here for hundreds of years, and more and more monasteries are constructed in the area as time goes by.
translation: 大人，我们收到了阿索斯山修道院的邀请函。那儿的僧侣轻易不让外人踏足他们的领域，这封邀请函足以证明您的尊贵异于常人。\n\n相传阿索斯山因圣母玛利亚的踏足而名闻天下——成为宗教圣地，她对此地是如此偏爱，以至让圣子将这里建成她的花园。如此一来，亚索斯山和它所在的半岛从此被尊崇为「圣母的花园」。也因为如此，这片圣地禁止妇女踏入半步。僧侣们已在此生活了数百年，随着时间的推移，修道院也越建越多。

original: I must go!
Tell the monks I cannot come.
Mount Athos

So this is Mount Athos! As you land on the shore in a small boat, you are escorted by a group of monks to a nearby monastery where you may spend the night. You are struck by the dramatic landscape and the variety of the ever growing number of monastery buildings. This is truly a strange and wondrous place!\n\nYou have a few days to spend here, and you hope to make the most of your visit.
translation: 这就是阿索斯山！小船靠到了海岸边，一群修士簇拥着你往附近的一个修道院走去——你将在此过夜。接下来的时间，你的身心被这里如画的风景和修道院的——持续数百年修建而构成的——建筑多样性深深吸引。这里可真是个奇妙而异乎寻常的地方！\n\n你决定在所剩无几的行程里，尽可能多逛几个地方。

original: I must see all the monasteries, the architecture here is fascinating!
translation: 我要参观所有的修道院，这里的建筑样式太有意思了！

original: I will spend my days conversing with these wise monks.
translation: 我将与睿智的僧侣坐而论道。

original: I have come here to pray.
